For more information about this series of campaigns, to discuss contribution strategies, ask questions, or to simply comment about this madness, go to the message board for this campaign series here.
About the Campaigns
The "Extras" aka "What I Would Do With This" sheets are each a single A5 sheet written by James Edward Raggi IV advising how he would change an adventure to give it a different sort of twist or fit into his own campaign.
There are risks for choosing bundle options - if the project you chose the bundle options on does not fund, you'd end up with nothing. If fewer than expected adventures fund, you're paying more than you would have by contributing to each adventure individually. Be aware of how you are contributing and what cost/benefit ratio you're willing to risk.
The perks above the single adventure levels are leaps of faith representing a desire to help get things funded and a hope of a better deal - but this is crowdfunding, we cannot guarantee results.
What is the Pembrooktonshire Gardening Society?
That's the LotFP Fan and Discount club. It costs 10€ to join (+23% VAT for EU orders), and you get a 1€ discount on all print products in the LotFP store forever. Sometimes other benefits too, like saving $50 on an exclusive hardcover set in these campaigns. Details on joining the Society here.
Where Does the Money Go?
Two-thirds of the money goes to the talent working on the project: The writer, artist, graphic designer, editor. The rest goes towards printing and shipping (and IndieGoGo's fees). The exact figure varies depending on how many of which perks are chosen, but LotFP will not begin making money on these projects until they hit $7000. LotFP's profits will (hopefully) come after the adventures are released and you all start raving about how cool the adventures are so the non-hardcore supporters go for them.
Other Notes
July 10 Update: (see the July 10 entry in the Updates tab for more info on these points) All funded adventures will include a PDF supplement with conversions to the "OGL 3.PF" rules system. A new funding level has been added: The 3.PF Faithful, with all these conversion notes and stats included in their own booklet New perks and information for The Faithful and Collecting Faithful levels:

If you go in for The Faithful level or above, and that adventure is the only one that funds, you will receive a 100€ coupon for the LotFP store. If only that and one other funds, you will receive a 50€ coupon.
An exclusive 64 page adventure by James Edward Raggi IV. This adventure will never again be printed in this format (only an abridged 32 or 48 page version in the future), only those pledging at the Faithful or Collecting Faithful levels on funded adventures will receive it. There will be no PDF version of this adventure. This adventure does not count against the ones mentioned in the previous bullet point. It will be included in your Collecting Faithful package but will not be a hardcover inside the slipcase.
A booklet with all of the "How I Would Fit This Into My Campaign" sheets, with cover art by Zak S (Vornheim, Playing D&D With Porn Stars, etc), will be included with these perks (will not be made as a hardcover for the slipcase).
For the Grab Bags, you may choose which adventures you want. A new perk: "Retail Support" has been added Three random Collector-level contributors on funded projects will get to have a character of their choice drawn by Jez Gordon in a situation from a funded adventure of their choice, with this art appearing in the Extras booklet.(end July 10 Update)
It is our intention to go to press in late November/early December. However, with a potential 19 authors and 18 artists involved, someone is likely to be late so the adventures may not ship out until the new year.
Some of the adventures in these campaigns will be for ages 18+ because of (im)mature content, so be aware of that before contributing to any adventures or multi-adventure perks. If you want to double-check whether any individual adventure will be an 18+ affair, leave a note in the comments and we'll get back to you shortly.
Adventure titles are all subject to change although I'll roast the authors' bits if they turn in something ridiculously different than their supplied description.
All prices include first class shipping from Finland, or a tracked parcel if your stuff comes out to over 1kg.
Each adventure is scheduled to be an A5 sized 32 page book and would retail for 10€-13€ ($13.00-$16.00 depending on exchange rates) not including taxes or shipping. The $20 single copy purchase price is the best approximation of the price including first class shipping worldwide but the real amount may or may not match that. Some adventures, depending on the adventure structures, may be more than 32 pages.
Each funded adventure will have a full print run done for distribution.
The author of a funded adventure will get 10% of all money raised above the $7000 mark, and the artist will get 5% of all money raised above that amount, in addition to their agreed-on fees. Additional profits go into the LotFP war chest.

story:
Our Story

Domnio: The Many-Storied Dungeon is a fantasy roleplaying game system that combines Old-School style of play with contemporary story-game techniques. The rules are based on the system outlined in the essay The Tao of Rules Hacking, a free PDF also written by me.

What We Need & What You Get

The book is going to be completed one way or another. Funding just gives me incentive to prioritize this project ahead of others, rather than "whenever I get around to it". After release, the prices will go up, so if nothing else preordering save you money. Any excess funds will be rolled over to finance future projects.

Other Ways You Can Help

Soon I'll be setting up an author page on Facebook, and you can "Like" it and spread the word to others! Follow me on Twitter (Berin_Kinsman) and hit me with some #followfriday love! Visit my blog (BerinKinsman.com) subscribe to the RSS feed! Leave comments on my blog posts! Tell your friends!

story:
Special from May 31st-June 8th!

Any and all donations made during this time period will be automatically upgraded to the next tier. Tier 4 donors will receive ANOTHER extra horse slot for added foals and fun!

That's not all! On June 8th, we'll raffle off even more fun prizes to any current donors as one HUGE thanks for supporting us!

What is Indomita?

A wild horse simulation game that gives you a chance to play as the characters. It's an attempt at a merger between the worlds of SIM horse games and play by post RPGs.

For the last fifteen years, I've been involved on and off with both communities, more so the RPG side of things. For several years I had been rping in a small, private community and sought to just create us a simple way to generate new foals. One page turned into two pages and before you know it, the first incarnation of Indomita was born. Since then, things have changed significantly and have (hopefully!) gotten even better.
What do we need?

I have been coding the game entirely by myself which has helped move things along however, I have no artistic ability to speak of. The game in its current state is relatively playable with the exception of the very limited amount of art that has been added. The game isn't incredibly heavy on art but it could definitely use some sprucing up and I'd like to get a jump on that before opening things up.

We also have recently suffered some weather related issues that took out the server the game was running on. Thankfully nothing was lost and everything was safely moved over but to be as efficient as we'd like things are going to have to be replaced. 

So funds will cover:

  • Server upgrades that we've made to ensure that things run smoothly.
  • Item art for the ever growing list of items characters can encounter and craft in the game.
  • NPC art for the specific and also generic creatures that can be encountered in battle or otherwise.

Here's a little preview of the horse art we already have for the game. It's in the process of being added in to go with character genetics. Thanks to the wonderful Esnym for this and the banner art!
What can you expect to see in the game?

Our list of features is always growing but at the time of this posting the following game features are live:

  • Register & login scripts
  • Private messaging
  • General forums
  • Character creation
  • Realistic and inheritable genetics system.
  • Map with movement for herds and individual horses coded in
  • Mares are claimable based upon location
  • Full personality system that can be altered as a character progress through life and levels
  • Action points system that allows full control over which actions a character chooses to do each day
  • Health, hunger, thirst and mood all increase and decrease based on a character's actions and location
  • Questing with a variety of different types of quests that vary with location
  • Interactions between herd members, personal relationships and to influence the personality of foals
  • Spar with other characters in the current location
  • 10 different skills for characters to level in
  • 6 different roles to level up in to unlock even more features
  • Crafting system for herd caretakers to create healing and stat increasing items
  • Challenge system that allow characters to battle for reputation, mares and even an entire herd
  • Inventory system with 40+ items
  • Coalitions where horses can interact with others of the same role/skill set and learned from them
  • Explorers can now find companions while questing and keep them with them to aid them in battles, exploring and other activities.

This is just a small portion of what has been planned so from now until the end of the campaign, you can be certain that things will only get more awesome!
When will it open?

With running the campaign, we're aiming for a July 1st release for all donors. As I've said, the game is in working order, we will just be adding in artwork and polishing things up after the end of the campaign.

In addition to all the perks below, during our opening week we'll be running a series of raffles that all account holders are eligible for. More information on this will be available as we get closer to the date.
Anything else?
I genuinely appreciate any support and encouragement and even constructive criticism that anyone might provide. I've been working on Indomita, in some form or another, for close to three years now and it is truly exciting to see it this close to finished. I'm going to be beyond thrilled to open her up and let everyone come on in!

Also here are some game play samples as well as a preview of the layout.

The Layout

User Page

Flat Map (Shading still required)

Location Actions

Scavenger NPC

Crafting

story:
• Arnie's* Cricket Challenge-the next best thing to playing cricket 'on the G'; @ the SCG, even at Lords!* pseudism for confidentiality purposes.

This all new broadcast Television-Multimedia Event is collectively based on the principals of the 'game of cricket' and where practical and for expediency; editorial and interactive content elements have been enhanced for visual and broad marketplace appeal of the Mobile Television Game-Show's Format Presentation and ease of accessibility by all Multimedia digital devices-smartphones, tablets, pc's and the Social Media platforms to collectively provide the greatest reach and access for YOU to Enter, Play, Watch and Win!  This Event will be huge across all 14 major Cricket playing nations! 

In excess of ONE BILLION PEOPLE will watch the global Multimedia broadcasts over the seven weeks carnival.What an event?

 i.e. Australia, New Zealand, India, South Africa, England, the West Indies, Sri                        Lanka, Pakistan, Bangladesh and the like.

This Multimedia Event features an exclusive and innovative Players Interactivity aspect that becomes the 'integral play element and sequence' of the Television Show's format and how to Play, Watch and Win! 

Your interactive game-play could set-up the Game's "win-play"! 

You could call the shots!

This is NOT a spot-betting game!

This is NOT a fantasy-format Cricket Game!

The Promoter is the creator and producer of this world exclusive Cricket Multimedia Event and has gained extensive expertise and professionalism in Sports marketing and Television production over the many years of his International business career.

The funds will be utilised to produced two different Television Game-Show format presentations together with the Events accompanying Marketing Report and inter-related support Promotional elements. The Cricket Project as I like to call it!

From receipt of funds, the studio production turn-around time-frame will be 35 working days; all 'pre-production and interlocking elements have been created and ready to go into the studio now'!

If you are a keen follower of the game of Cricket, I'm sure that you will get a real 'kick' out of my offered 'perks'. I hope so?

Thank you for your support in advance and watch out for Cricket's World Cup and Arnie's*Cricket Challenge from 14th February 2015.

In addition, there will be a special Charity Benefits Foundation that will be the recipient of this unique Project's shared financial successes. Initially, we will be 'providing a helping hand to the ANZAC Vets and Homeless children'.

Now, have a look at the 'perks'!

*ARNIE'S actual "brand name and character" will be released by years end. Strategic Marketing Confidentially is paramount as I am sure that you will well understand. Thank you.

story:
Click aqui para ver el video en español: http://bit.ly/1bN26fq

More info on this project:



Newest screenshots:


What is "Venture Tales":

It's a business simulator & strategy video game (for Windows, Mac + Linux) about setting up your own start-up; this game aims to entertain and inform players about the real world of business in a fun way.

A business simulator is a unique subject that is not seen often in video games. Plus it's also unique in that it will inform about how the real world of business works, therefore it will be a great oportunity to learn about the subject to actual beginning entrepeneurs and curious people, while they are having fun playing it.

Also since knowledge is power, it will be a great way to give more power to people so that they can have more freedom to add value to society in a positive way.



Why crowdfunding?:

I need to raise money to get together a team of programmers to work full time to complete a playable alpha version in about 5 months, for that I need to raise 20,000USD. The team that will work on the intial months will be 3 experienced programmers working on it including me. This game will be DRM-free for PC, Mac, Linux , Android and iOS mobile devices (Possibly OUYA too). Once this playable version has been released, we will use community feedback and metrics to mold the game to reach it's greatest potential, and we will continue to develop it with a target of having a final version of the game in a maximum of 2 years.


Details on the game:

Here is more info on the subjects the game will tackle, each part would be a detailed mechanic which will have an effect on the overall simulation of the in-game-world.

  1. You'll be playing a game of life, where you have your own in-game character, living with his family, you need to manage your time, and organize your life, your stress levels, your education, and your effectiveness in your business with the help of your in-game schedule and calendar.

  2. You'll be able to take care of your relationships with your family, friends, co-workers, society, etc. If you spend too much time at work, you won't have time for family life.

  3. You can choose how to live your private life, where and how to spend your money.

  4. You can contact people, consultants, services, distributors, marketing, partners, negotiate and makes deals with them to work together.

  5. Manage and make contracts with services, other people, employees, etc.

  6. Keep track and work on legal and law matters.

  7. Evaluate and choose employees, and assign them to whatever job you choose in your company. Create the company hierarchy.


  8. Organize, control, and manage employees. 

  9. Create and manage all the inner workings of your business from the inside out using an innovative visual representation that shows all the processes and activities in your business at the same time.

  10. You will be able to analize maps that shows different data of the context of where you live and relating to how your businesses influence society.

  11. Control of spending, finances, earnings, flow of money, etc.

  12. Manage different variables of your business, money, times of processes, quality of production or service, client satisfaction, etc.

  13. Study of the market to obtain and maintain clients and other purposes. 

  14. Get financing, create business plans, get help from incubators, accelerators, investors, get loans from banks or other mediums, etc. 

  15. Research and development of business ideas and products. 

  16. Buy and sell of real state using a world and city map. 

  17. Manage transport times. 

  18. React to events and news that affect the world and your business.


Why make a business simulator?:

To spread knowledge about how to create and lead a succesful business. This game will try to educate and inform people in order to give them the confidence to start-up their own real-world company, and trough it affect their society in a positive way, while reaping the personal benefits a succesful business might bring. It is meant to inspire and be fun too!


How will we do it?:

I have been doing research on how to start a business for a couple of years and I also have experience trying to setup my businesses as a graphic designer, illustrator, coach, and also as a indie game developer. Altought my research and experience has helped a lot into the fundamental design of this game, this is not enough to make this game a great and really useful informative medium, this is why I need to hire business consultants.

We need the money to get the help of business consultants in order to make the game as informative and educational as possible about how the real world of businesses works. If we get help from business experts we will be able to make a game that will serve as an introduction for any person who wants to understand how to create and maintain a succesful business. Getting professional business input at the start of this proyect is very important. We need their help from the very beginning of the project in order to set the foundations of the game and give it the right direction, if we hire them later we may have to modify big portions of the game that do not contribute to it's educational purposes, and that would cost us time and money, meaning you won't be able to play it as soon as possible.

We also need the money to pay our programmers in order to create a playable proof of concept, a pre alpha version in 5 months, with only the most important parts of the game, and be able to realease it as soon as possible before 5 months, so we can develop it with the input and feedback from it's players. That way we can change and mould the game according to the feedback of our community of players. This model is called Alphafunding, and is a model that was succesfuly applied by many other games including Minecraft and Prison Architect.

We will also need to invest in a web page that will serve as our own crowdfunding site, and from where we will be able to keep accepting pledges, colaborations, and donations, in exchange for rewards, including the playable pre alpha version of the game. This is a very important part of this proyect, since this ongoing crowdfunding model will allow us to keep developing the game beyond the initial 5 months. This model was done succesfully by games like Star Citizen and Prison Architect too.

We also need to hire a better artist and graphic designer, a musician and sound designer.

We also need the money to set up a legal entity in order to receive the funds.


Who will do this?:

I am Christian Ibarra, you may know me from flash games such as “Zombie Home Run” (Click here to play Zombie Home Run) and “TwitchPack” (Click here to play Twitchpack), and also an old downloadable game called “Happier than you”. I'm a programmer, graphic designer, illustrator (Click here to access Christian Ibarra's Art Gallery), game designer and coach. 

I have almost 20 years of experience developing games as a hobby, programming, designing and making the art for them myself. Now my dream is to form a group of talented developers to be able to create video games that are not only fun and innovative, but also have a positive impact on society.

The team I want to put together are:

Pablo Fuente Salas, a very experienced programmer with more than 21 years of profesional experience, he worked for many companies including video game companies.

Kevin Seligman, has worked on various game projects, for various companies, his roles included beign a lead programer.

Karla Circe Consolacion, a great artist that can add personality and charm to the game. (Click here to access her Art Portfolio) 

A great Musician soon to be announced!.

We will also get the help of various business consultants.

Sarah Burrough, Pre-campaign advisor - I’ve also stolen the services of Nelly Cootalot’s Campaign Manager Sarah. Continuing her world domination strategies she has helped sort the tiers and has been on-hand with the set-up on this crowd funder.


Art from our artist:


When will we do this?:

Once the target amount is raised we will complete a playable alpha version in about 5 months. Then using our own web-site we can maintain an ongoing crowdfunding campaign while we use the pre-alpha version of this game to get input from the community of players, until we develop the final version of the game. We plan to reach the final version of the game in a maximum of 2 years.

So, when people help us reach our target goal of 20,000usd  they are actually helping us to complete a playable demo to start an ongoing crowdfunding campaign through our own web site like many other projects did, like Star citizen, The Pit, Prison Architect, and others. And of course they will also get all future updates of the game until reaching the final version, plus all the rewards they have bought.


Stretch Goals:

All stretch goals includes better and more music and art made by our hired artists, plus more hours with our business experts to secure a great educative game.

20,000usd Our first goal, A playable pre-alpha version of the game in 5 months.

31,000usd 9 total months of secure programming work to complete the game. 

42,000usd 13 total months of secure programming work to complete the game. 

53,000usd 17 total months of secure programming work to complete the game. 

64,000usd 21 total months of secure programming work to complete the game.

75,000usd 24 total months of secure programming work to complete the game, wich means, the complete development of the game!. We can also buy a few hardware devices to port and test this game to, like a Mac, an android device for mobile phone versions, a tablet, and an iphone.


We need your Help:

To raise the money the team need your pledges, in exchange for this we will provide you with an assortment of returns both digital and physical and all of them amazing and unique. Please see below tier matrix or read the descriptions on the side to see what you can get when you help our cause.

Other support would be to share this campaign on your social media feeds, friends and family.

Thank you for your time.


Perks:

Applicant: $2.

Thank you for your application! Please take a seat and someone will e-mail you with a nice personalized "thank you" shortly.


Intern: $5.

All previous + Appear on the credits section on our upcoming website.


Apprentice: $10.

All previous + Pre-alpha version of the game + All future patches and updates (not including dlc) + Exclusive access to "backers only" forums + VIP badge in forums + Appear in the credits in the game, in the Apprentices section + Digital game manual.


Post Room: $20.

All previous + Digital soundtrack of the game + Digital strategy guide + A digital guide to create businesses in real life made with the help of our profesional consultants + Digital wall papers + Avatar images + Ringtone.


Tea Maid: $30.

All previous + 1 copy of the game + comic/graphic novel on the theme of business + Digital book of concept art, design docs, making-of, mockups, development ideas, etc.


Technician: $50.

All previous + 1 copy of the game + Limited edition Mouse pad + Limited edition poster 40x60 (signed by our game programmers is optional).


Code Monkey: $75.

All previous + Limited Edition Physical soundtrack CD (signed by the team of programmers is optional).


Administrator: $95.

Risks:

If our initial crowdfunding campaign does not generate enough revenue in order to continue development after our first financing money runs out, we will do a second crowdfunding campaign in order to be able to complete its development.

If we don't achieve our crowd-funding goals, I will seek for other funding options in government, business organizations, educational organizations, and others. If that doesn't work, I will raise money by my own after a few of years of work in other areas.

But this last resort option will delay the development of the game several years.


Frequent Asked Questions:

Q: Will backers get their rewards if we don't reach our goal?.

A: Yes!, they will get their rewards. Have in mind that for some rewards, we will only be able to complete them after we get far enough into development, so if we don't get enough money, we might take longer than expected to develop and deliver that reward. For example, you won't be able to see your name in the game until we reach that phase in the development where we are creating characters, and that will take us a couple of months, and each month costs us money.
story_txt:
Click aqui para ver el video en español: http://bit.ly/1bN26fq
More info on this project:


Newest screenshots:
















What is "Venture Tales":
It's a business simulator & strategy video game (for Windows, Mac + Linux) about setting up your own start-up; this game aims to entertain and inform players about the real world of business in a fun way.

A
business simulator is a unique subject that is not seen often in
video games. Plus it's also unique in that it will inform about how 
the real world of business works, therefore it will be a great
oportunity to learn about the subject to actual beginning
entrepeneurs and curious people, while they are having fun playing
it.
Also
since knowledge is power, it will be a great way to give more power
to people so that they can have more freedom to add value to society
in a positive way.







Why crowdfunding?:

I need to raise money to get together a team of programmers to work full time to complete a playable alpha version in about 5 months, for that I need to raise 20,000USD. The team that will work on the intial months will be 3 experienced programmers working on it including me. This game will be DRM-free for PC, Mac, Linux , Android and iOS mobile devices (Possibly OUYA too). Once this playable version has been released, we will use community feedback and metrics to mold the game to reach it's greatest potential, and we will continue to develop it with a target of having a final version of the game in a maximum of 2 years.

Details on the game:

Here
is more info on the subjects the game will tackle, each part would be
a detailed mechanic which will have an effect on the overall
simulation of the in-game-world.


You'll
	be playing a game of life, where you have your own in-game
	character, living with his family, you need to manage your time, and
	organize your life, your stress levels, your education, and your
	effectiveness in your business with the help of your in-game
	schedule and calendar.


You'll
	be able to take care of your relationships with your family,
	friends, co-workers, society, etc. If you spend too much time at
	work, you won't have time for family life.


You
	can choose how to live your private life, where and how to spend
	your money.


You
	can contact people, consultants, services, distributors, marketing,
	partners, negotiate and makes deals with them to work together.


Manage
	and make contracts with services, other people, employees, etc.


Keep
	track and work on legal and law matters.


Evaluate
	and choose employees, and assign them to whatever job you choose in
	your company. Create the company hierarchy.





Organize,
	control, and manage employees. 


Create
	and manage all the inner workings of your business from the inside
	out using an innovative visual representation that shows all the
	processes and activities in your business at the same time. 
	


You
	will be able to analize maps that shows different data of the
	context of where you live and relating to how your businesses
	influence society.


Control
	of spending, finances, earnings, flow of money, etc.


Manage
	different variables of your business, money, times of processes,
	quality of production or service, client satisfaction, etc.


Study
	of the market to obtain and maintain clients and other purposes. 


Get
	financing, create business plans, get help from incubators,
	accelerators, investors, get loans from banks or other mediums,
	etc. 


Research
	and development of business ideas and products. 


Buy
	and sell of real state using a world and city map. 


Manage
	transport times. 


React
	to events and news that affect the world and
	your business.





Why make a business simulator?:
To
spread knowledge about how to create and lead a succesful business.
This game will try to educate and inform people in order to give them
the confidence to start-up their own real-world company, and trough
it affect their society in a positive way, while reaping the personal
benefits a succesful business might bring. It is meant to inspire and
be fun too!



How will we do it?:
I
have been doing research on how to start a business for a couple of
years and I also have experience trying to setup my businesses as a
graphic designer, illustrator, coach, and also as a indie game
developer. Altought my research and experience has helped a lot into
the fundamental design of this game, this is not enough to make this
game a great and really useful informative medium, this is why I need
to hire business consultants. 

We
need the money to get the help of business consultants in order to
make the game as informative and educational as possible about how
the real world of businesses works. If we get help from business
experts we will be able to make a game that will serve as an
introduction for any person who wants to understand how to create and
maintain a succesful business. Getting professional business input at
the start of this proyect is very important. We need their help from
the very beginning of the project in order to set the foundations of
the game and give it the right direction, if we hire them later we
may have to modify big portions of the game that do not contribute to
it's educational purposes, and that would cost us time and money,
meaning you won't be able to play it as soon as possible.
We
also need the money to pay our programmers in order to create a
playable proof of concept, a pre alpha version in 5 months, with only
the most important parts of the game, and be able to realease it as
soon as possible before 5 months, so we can  develop it with the
input and feedback from it's players. That way we can change and
mould the game according to the feedback of our community of players.
This model is called Alphafunding, and is a model that was succesfuly
applied by many other games including Minecraft and Prison Architect.
We
will also need to invest in a web page that will serve as our own
crowdfunding site, and from where we will be able to keep accepting
pledges, colaborations, and donations, in exchange for rewards,
including the playable pre alpha version of the game. This is a very
important part of this proyect, since this ongoing crowdfunding model
will allow us to keep developing the game beyond the initial 5
months. This model was done succesfully by games like Star Citizen
and Prison Architect too.
We
also need to hire a better artist and graphic designer, a musician
and sound designer.
We
also need the money to set up a legal entity in order to receive the
funds.



Who will do this?:
I
am Christian Ibarra, you may know me from flash games such as “Zombie
Home Run” (Click here to play Zombie Home Run) and “TwitchPack” (Click here to play Twitchpack), and also an old
downloadable game called “Happier than you”. I'm a programmer,
graphic designer, illustrator (Click here to access Christian Ibarra's Art Gallery), game designer and coach. 
I have almost
20 years of experience developing games as a hobby, programming,
designing and making the art for them myself. Now my dream is to form
a group of talented developers to be able to create video games that
are not only fun and innovative, but also have a positive impact on
society.
The
team I want to put together are:
Pablo
Fuente Salas, a very experienced programmer with more than 21 years
of profesional experience, he worked for many companies including
video game companies.
Kevin
Seligman, has worked on various game projects, for various companies,
his roles included beign a lead programer.
Karla Circe Consolacion, a great artist that can add personality and charm to the game. (Click here to access her Art Portfolio) 
A great Musician soon to be announced!.
We will also get the help of various business consultants.
Sarah Burrough, Pre-campaign advisor - I’ve also stolen the services of Nelly Cootalot’s
Campaign Manager Sarah. Continuing her world domination strategies
she has helped sort the tiers and has been on-hand with the set-up on
this crowd funder.

Art from our artist:



When will we do this?:

Once
the
              target amount is raised we will complete
              a playable alpha
              version in about 5 months. Then using our own web-site we
              can
              maintain an ongoing crowdfunding campaign while we use the
              pre-alpha
              version of this game to get input from the community of
              players, until we
              develop the final version of the game. We plan to reach
              the final
              version of the game in a maximum of 2 years.
      
So,
                when people help us reach our target goal of 20,000usd  they are actually helping us to
                      complete a playable demo to start an ongoing crowdfunding campaign
                          through our own web site like many other
      projects did, like Star citizen, The Pit, Prison Architect, and others. And of course they will also
                          get all future updates of the
                            game until reaching the final
                              version,
              plus all the rewards they have bought.




Stretch
Goals:
All stretch goals includes better and more music and art made by our hired artists, plus more hours with our business experts to secure a great educative game.
20,000usd
Our first goal, A playable pre-alpha version of the game in 5 months.
31,000usd
9 total months of secure programming work to complete the game. 
42,000usd
13 total months of secure programming work to complete the game. 
53,000usd
17 total months of secure programming work to complete the game. 
64,000usd
21 total months of secure programming work to complete the game.
75,000usd
24  total  months of secure programming work to complete the game,
wich means, the complete development of the game!. We can also buy a
few hardware devices to port and test this game to, like a Mac, an
android device for mobile phone versions, a tablet, and an iphone.








We need your Help:

To
raise the money the team need your pledges, in exchange for this we
will provide you with an assortment of returns both digital and
physical and all of them amazing and unique. Please see below tier
matrix or read the descriptions on the side to see what you can get
when you help our cause.
Other
support would be to share this campaign on your social media feeds,
friends and family.
Thank
you for your time.


Perks:

Applicant: $2.




Thank you for your application! Please take a seat and someone will e-mail you with a nice personalized "thank you" shortly.


Intern: $5.





All previous + Appear on the credits section on our upcoming website.

All previous + Pre-alpha version of the game + All future patches and updates (not including dlc) + Exclusive access to "backers only" forums + VIP badge in forums + Appear in the credits in the game, in the Apprentices section + Digital game manual.

All previous + Digital soundtrack of the game + Digital strategy guide + A digital guide to create businesses in real life made with the help of our profesional consultants + Digital wall papers + Avatar images + Ringtone.

All previous + 1 copy of the game + comic/graphic novel on the theme of business + Digital book of concept art, design docs, making-of, mockups, development ideas, etc.



Technician: $50.





All previous + 1 copy of the game + Limited edition Mouse pad + Limited edition poster 40x60 (signed by our game programmers is optional).

story: Thanks for your support.
story_txt: Thanks for your support.

story:
The SwitchCharge was born out of our love for the Nintendo Switch™. We play it everywhere, at home, at work, on the train and heck even in the bath! It’s an incredible console with equally great games.

Yet there’s a constant worry when using a Switch on the go and trying to play the games we love. If you’re taking a long flight, have a sizeable commute or simply want to explore Breath of the Wild for more than a couple hours at a time, then battery life is a worry. There’s also no getting around it, the kickstand for the Switch sucks and we’re not only ones to have these problems…

Trusted Reviews: "you can’t play in ‘tabletop’ mode with the kickstand and charge at the same time. Bizarre."

TechRadar: "The Switch draws so much power that at best they (portable phone battery packs) prevented the battery from dropping during play, rather than actively recharging it."

Engadget: "As you'd expect, battery life is the Switch's biggest portable problem"

CNET: "Thing is, the Switch's kickstand isn't great. It's easy to tip. I've only been playing around with a Switch for a couple of days, and I've easily knocked it over a dozen times already."

 

Therefore using our experience with bringing technology products to market we decided to create our own case. This case was designed with feedback from hundreds of Nintendo fans and we believe it is the best accessory available for the Nintendo Switch™.

Introducing the SwitchCharge:

 

The SwitchCharge is the world’s first multifunctional battery case designed for the Nintendo Switch™. It incorporates a high capacity 10,000mAh battery, mobile phone charging, an improved kickstand, 2 game card slots and also added protection for your Switch.


All of this is packed into a case which is not only thin and light but also, allows you to take the Nintendo Switch™ anywhere without the worry of running out of battery.

 

SwitchCharge aims to rid the need to bring with you multiple accessories. Instead SwitchCharge is designed to be ultra portable, thin and lightweight. The added battery life not only gives you the ability to play wherever you are on the go but also add's protection to your Nintendo Switch™.

 

Battery

The 10,000mAh battery gives you up to 12 hours of additional battery life (when playing more intensive games) so you can play on the go without the need for bringing extra wires and a large, bulky battery pack (many of which don’t even work!). 

With our technology, the SwitchCharge’s battery has been specifically designed to push out a high output allowing you to play and charge the Switch at the same time. 

Battery Life Tests:

  • The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild: 10hrs 40mins
  • Mario Kart 8: 10 hrs 45 mins
  • 1-2-Switch: 12hrs 55mins
  • Fast RMX: 13hrs 20mins
  • Snipperclips: 13hrs 30mins
  • Shovel Knight: 14hrs 15mins  

 

  

 

Play and Charge

The SwitchCharge is the first battery accessory designed specifically for the Nintendo Switch™. It allows you to charge and play on the go with no wires or bulky battery packs required. Many other battery packs on the market are not designed for the power hungry Switch and so can't charge fast enough whilst you're playing.

Mobile Phone Charging!

With the included USB-A port you can charge any device whilst also charging your Nintendo Switch. Now no need to carry around an extra battery power bank for your mobile phone.

Improved Kickstand

The SwitchCharge has an improved kickstand which offers greater stability and can be deployed at multiple angles to change the way you play. In fact, because we’ve moved the charging port to the right-hand side of the case, the SwitchCharge is one of the only ways to charge while playing in tabletop mode.

 

 

 

2 Game Card Slots


No need for extra carrying cases, the SwitchCharge not only protects the Nintendo Switch™ but also has slots for 2 extra game cards to bring along with you on the go.

 

​

 

Quick Lock/Unlock


With its two-part design, you can quickly lock and unlock the Switch into the case by simply pulling the top section up and sliding the switch out of its dock. To re-attach place the Switch into the USB C bottom dock, then click the top section down to firmly lock in place.

 

LED Battery Indicator

A LED battery indicator on the side of the SwitchCharge lets you easily know how much charge you have remaining. When it flashes RED you know it's nearly run out.

 

Slim Design

The SwitchCharge is built with durable ABS plastic, which is able to withstand most drops and scratches. We have kept a thin form factor and allowed easy access to all the required ports.

It's perfect to take with you on the go and easily fits in most pockets.

 

Heat regulation

The SwitchCharge has also been built to combat the problems of overheating and potential warping of the device. We have included a small gap between the Switch and the SwitchCharge to allow for airflow to cool down both devices. The dock system makes sure the Switch remains in place securely.

 

The SwitchCharge is perfect to play in the following ways:

 

1. On the go in handheld mode

 

2. Charge while playing on table top mode

 

Width: 158mm

Height: 118mm

Depth: 26mm

Weight: 390g

Game Card Slots: 2

Internal Battery Type: Lithium-ion battery

Battery capacity: 10,000mAh

Power output: 5V/2.4A

Ports: USB-C + USB-A

Battery Life: Up to 12 hours additional battery in real world usage.

Charging Time: Approx 3 hours.

 

 

 

To lock the Switch in place take the following steps:

  1. Unclick and slide the top section upwards 2/3cm. It will remain attached to the case
  2. Slide the Switch into the case making sure it locks into the USB C plug in the base
  3. Slide the top section downwards until you hear a click

Easy access to all ports on the top of the Switch due to the large cut-outs.

The secure the game cards into place simply slide the game card into a free slot until it reaches the bottom. To remove use your finger to push the exposed back of the card upwards to free the game card.

 

 

Please contact us if you are unsure of which Perk is right for you or if you have any further questions about backing our project.

 

Referral Program

 

We want to reward our dedicated Nintendo community. Therefore, from now until the end of the SwitchCharge campaign, you can refer your friends to get accessories and products. Let’s begin the sharing fun!

The rules are simple:

  • Login to your Indiegogo account and go to our page.
  • Copy your unique referral link:

  • Share your unique referral link with your friends and ask them to join the SwitchCharge community by placing an order for a SwitchCharge on Indiegogo
  • You’ll receive FREE referral prizes including shipping! Types of prizes vary depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.

 

See below for prizes:

Who can enter:

You must be a SwitchCharge backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.

How do you enter:

Log into Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools. We suggest writing a post on social media with your link attached to get the most referrals! 

How to Track Your Results:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your username beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
  5. See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.
  6. We’ll send you free merchandise based on the total points earned!

 

InDemand Design, the inventors of SwitchCharge, is a new design/engineering agency bringing together designers and engineers from multiple technology backgrounds. The team, currently 7 strong, share one main thing in common: their love of the Nintendo Switch. With your support, we can speed up our manufacturing schedule and bring the accessory that everyone needs to market. The agency has been built to be agile and adapt to trends quickly, from our experience we have found traditional agencies to be too slow to market.

We have already developed prototypes and we're now looking to enter mass production. However, we need support from the Indiegogo community to make the SwitchCharge a reality. Once we reach our goal of $80,000, we'll be able to ship to our backers in under 3 months time. The initial investment will go both into tooling and the components required. 

We are currently in the middle of our product development stage. We are creating the very best product based upon all the feedback we have received. We are on track and are making good progress. 

 

As with all crowdfunded projects, bringing SwitchCharge to life will be a thorough and complex task as we turn our prototypes into production. There are factors such as sourcing parts and shipping logistics that can cause possible delays. 

We’re committed to making SwitchCharge a success and will ensure we keep you up-to-date throughout this journey. Thank you for your support!

 

For any press inquiries please reach out to: info@switchcharge.co.uk

You can also download all relevant assets and press releases below:

 

What is the SwitchCharge?

The SwitchCharge is the world’s first multifunctional battery case designed for the Nintendo Switch. It incorporates a high capacity 10,000mAh battery, an improved kickstand, 2 game card slots and also added protection for your Switch.

Who created it?

We are a team of Nintendo Switch fans who have years of experience in bringing technology products to market. We are based in London and are creating this product not just for us but for the Nintendo community also.

Why should we use it?

It's for people who love the Switch as much as us and want to make sure they can play their favourite games wherever they go. The SwitchCharge improves not only the battery life but the kickstand also, allowing you to play on table top mode on any surface.

How much does it cost? 

Our early backers can get the SwitchCharge case at $75 - up to 40% off the retail price of $130.

Where can we buy it? 

Right here on Indiegogo! Pre-order yours today to be one of the first people to get the SwitchCharge.

Why are you crowdfunding?

We love crowdfunding! For us, it's a perfect solution to ensure we meet minimum order quantities for the first production batch - our tooling is done and we're ready to scale up our manufacturing.

How long does the battery last?

Our Lithium Ion battery has been designed to match the high power requirements of the Nintendo Switch. Through our initial testing, we have found for the most intensive games like Zelda we have got nearly 11 hours of battery life, and for less intensive games closer to 16 hours.

What other additional features are available?

On top of the great added battery life, the SwitchCharge also offers an improved Kickstand, 2 game card slots and added protection for your Switch. It is the ultimate accessory!   

Have you got licensing for the SwitchCharge from Nintendo?

We are looking to get Official Licensing for the SwitchCharge, once we receive full backing we can progress these talks further. Our aim is to receive full licensing before delivery! 

When does shipping begin?

Shipping for ALL outstanding cases is on track to commence Late November 2017.

When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?

All orders are expected to be delivered to your doorsteps for March 2018 depending on where you live.

Where does it ship?

We're proud to ship our cases worldwide. 

How much is shipping?

Please see reward details for all other locations. Local taxes not included.

I'm interested in a distribution partnership.

Please contact info@switchcharge.co.uk and include in your email the region(s) you distribute to.

How do I choose more than one reward? 

To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.

How can I check the status of my pre-order?

By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

info@switchcharge.co.uk
story_txt:
The SwitchCharge was born out of our love for the Nintendo Switch™. We play it everywhere, at home, at work, on the train and heck even in the bath! It’s an incredible console with equally great games.
Yet there’s a constant worry when using a Switch on the go and trying to play the games we love. If you’re taking a long flight, have a sizeable commute or simply want to explore Breath of the Wild for more than a couple hours at a time, then battery life is a worry. There’s also no getting around it, the kickstand for the Switch sucks and we’re not only ones to have these problems…

Trusted Reviews: "you can’t play in ‘tabletop’ mode with the kickstand and charge at the same time. Bizarre."
TechRadar: "The Switch draws so much power that at best they (portable phone battery packs) prevented the battery from dropping during play, rather than actively recharging it."
Engadget: "As you'd expect, battery life is the Switch's biggest portable problem"
CNET: "Thing is, the Switch's kickstand isn't great. It's easy to tip. I've only been playing around with a Switch for a couple of days, and I've easily knocked it over a dozen times already."
 
Therefore using our experience with bringing technology products to market we decided to create our own case. This case was designed with feedback from hundreds of Nintendo fans and we believe it is the best accessory available for the Nintendo Switch™.
Introducing the SwitchCharge:
 

The SwitchCharge is the world’s first multifunctional battery case designed for the Nintendo Switch™. It incorporates a high capacity 10,000mAh battery, mobile phone charging, an improved kickstand, 2 game card slots and also added protection for your Switch.
All of this is packed into a case which is not only thin and light but also, allows you to take the Nintendo Switch™ anywhere without the worry of running out of battery.

 

SwitchCharge aims to rid the need to bring with you multiple accessories. Instead SwitchCharge is designed to be ultra portable, thin and lightweight. The added battery life not only gives you the ability to play wherever you are on the go but also add's protection to your Nintendo Switch™.


 

Battery
The 10,000mAh battery gives you up to 12 hours of additional battery life (when playing more intensive games) so you can play on the go without the need for bringing extra wires and a large, bulky battery pack (many of which don’t even work!). 
With our technology, the SwitchCharge’s battery has been specifically designed to push out a high output allowing you to play and charge the Switch at the same time. 
Battery Life Tests:

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild: 10hrs 40mins 

Mario Kart 8: 10 hrs 45 mins

1-2-Switch: 12hrs 55mins

Fast RMX: 13hrs 20mins 

Snipperclips: 13hrs 30mins

Shovel Knight: 14hrs 15mins  


 

  
 
Play and Charge
The SwitchCharge is the first battery accessory designed specifically for the Nintendo Switch™. It allows you to charge and play on the go with no wires or bulky battery packs required. Many other battery packs on the market are not designed for the power hungry Switch and so can't charge fast enough whilst you're playing.

Mobile Phone Charging!
With the included USB-A port you can charge any device whilst also charging your Nintendo Switch. Now no need to carry around an extra battery power bank for your mobile phone.


Improved Kickstand
The SwitchCharge has an improved kickstand which offers greater stability and can be deployed at multiple angles to change the way you play. In fact, because we’ve moved the charging port to the right-hand side of the case, the SwitchCharge is one of the only ways to charge while playing in tabletop mode.
 

 
 
2 Game Card Slots
No need for extra carrying cases, the SwitchCharge not only protects the Nintendo Switch™ but also has slots for 2 extra game cards to bring along with you on the go.
 

 ​
 
Quick Lock/Unlock
With its two-part design, you can quickly lock and unlock the Switch into the case by simply pulling the top section up and sliding the switch out of its dock. To re-attach place the Switch into the USB C bottom dock, then click the top section down to firmly lock in place.

 
LED Battery Indicator
A LED battery indicator on the side of the SwitchCharge lets you easily know how much charge you have remaining. When it flashes RED you know it's nearly run out.

 
Slim Design
The SwitchCharge is built with durable ABS plastic, which is able to withstand most drops and scratches. We have kept a thin form factor and allowed easy access to all the required ports.
It's perfect to take with you on the go and easily fits in most pockets.

 
Heat regulation
The SwitchCharge has also been built to combat the problems of overheating and potential warping of the device. We have included a small gap between the Switch and the SwitchCharge to allow for airflow to cool down both devices. The dock system makes sure the Switch remains in place securely.

 
The SwitchCharge is perfect to play in the following ways:
 
1. On the go in handheld mode

 
2. Charge while playing on table top mode

 

Width: 158mm
Height: 118mm
Depth: 26mm
Weight: 390g
Game Card Slots: 2
Internal Battery Type: Lithium-ion battery
Battery capacity: 10,000mAh
Power output: 5V/2.4A
Ports: USB-C + USB-A
Battery Life: Up to 12 hours additional battery in real world usage.
Charging Time: Approx 3 hours.
 

 

 

To lock the Switch in place take the following steps:

Unclick and slide the top section upwards 2/3cm. It will remain attached to the case
Slide the Switch into the case making sure it locks into the USB C plug in the base
Slide the top section downwards until you hear a click


Easy access to all ports on the top of the Switch due to the large cut-outs.

The secure the game cards into place simply slide the game card into a free slot until it reaches the bottom. To remove use your finger to push the exposed back of the card upwards to free the game card.
 

 

Please contact us if you are unsure of which Perk is right for you or if you have any further questions about backing our project.
 
Referral Program
 
We want to reward our dedicated Nintendo community. Therefore, from now until the end of the SwitchCharge campaign, you can refer your friends to get accessories and products. Let’s begin the sharing fun!
The rules are simple:

Login to your Indiegogo account and go to our page.
Copy your unique referral link:





Share your unique referral link with your friends and ask them to join the SwitchCharge community by placing an order for a SwitchCharge on Indiegogo
You’ll receive FREE referral prizes including shipping! Types of prizes vary depending on how many referral orders are tracked via Indiegogo.

 
See below for prizes:

Who can enter:
You must be a SwitchCharge backer on Indiegogo to qualify. Each backer has a unique Indiegogo ID and unique referral URL.
How do you enter:
Log into Indiegogo. Then, visit our campaign page on Indiegogo and look to the right of the main video to share using Indiegogo’s share tools. We suggest writing a post on social media with your link attached to get the most referrals! 
How to Track Your Results:

Log into your Indiegogo account.
Click on your username beside the search box at the top right of the page.
Select the “My Profile” option.
Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
See the number of funders and your total referred contribution amount.
We’ll send you free merchandise based on the total points earned!

 


InDemand Design, the inventors of SwitchCharge, is a new design/engineering agency bringing together designers and engineers from multiple technology backgrounds. The team, currently 7 strong, share one main thing in common: their love of the Nintendo Switch. With your support, we can speed up our manufacturing schedule and bring the accessory that everyone needs to market. The agency has been built to be agile and adapt to trends quickly, from our experience we have found traditional agencies to be too slow to market.
We have already developed prototypes and we're now looking to enter mass production. However, we need support from the Indiegogo community to make the SwitchCharge a reality. Once we reach our goal of $80,000, we'll be able to ship to our backers in under 3 months time. The initial investment will go both into tooling and the components required. 


We are currently in the middle of our product development stage. We are creating the very best product based upon all the feedback we have received. We are on track and are making good progress. 

 




As with all crowdfunded projects, bringing SwitchCharge to life will be a thorough and complex task as we turn our prototypes into production. There are factors such as sourcing parts and shipping logistics that can cause possible delays. 
We’re committed to making SwitchCharge a success and will ensure we keep you up-to-date throughout this journey. Thank you for your support!

Our aim is to receive full licensing before delivery! When does shipping begin?Shipping for ALL outstanding cases is on track to commence Late November 2017.When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?All orders are expected to be delivered to your doorsteps for March 2018 depending on where you live.Where does it ship? We're proud to ship our cases worldwide. How much is shipping?Please see reward details for all other locations. Local taxes not included.I'm interested in a distribution partnership.Please contact info@switchcharge.co.uk and include in your email the region(s) you distribute to.How do I choose more than one reward? To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.How can I check the status of my pre-order?By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.If I have other questions, who should I contact?info@switchcharge.co.uk

story:
What is Timewarp Arcade?

A year ago, we finally opened a fifteen year long dream to open a classic style gaming arcade.
We charge a single, very low entry fee and all machines are set to unlimited free credits, stay as long as you want and play as much as you want!
Based in Bridgwater, Somerset (UK),  we are the only arcade of this type in the whole South West (as far as we know).
We currently have over 40 arcade attractions, mostly video cabs from the 80's, 90's and 00's but also have pool tables, pinball, a dance machine and air hockey.
Our collection includes a 1983 Star Wars Cockpit, Rave Racer Twin, Aliens Extermination, Fighting Mania, and loads more jamma, Neo Geo and dedicated games covering all tastes and ages.
We open every Friday evening 6pm till 10pm and every Saturday and Sunday from midday till 8pm.

Why Do We Need Funding?

To date, we haven't borrowed any money from the banks or crowd funding. So far we have invested over £50,000 of our own money and put in thousands of unpaid hours getting the arcade to where it is. But sadly the funds have run out and the arcade is just short of breaking even each week. We just need a handful more visitors each week to get us above break even and ultimately keep us open.
We believe getting about ten more machines will help raise the visitors by enough to get us above the break even point. 
Once we start covering the weekly overheads we should be able to start investing in even more machines till the arcade is full to capacity.

What Are We Looking To Buy?
We ideally want about 10 more machines. These would mostly be a mix of generic machines so we can change the games in them often to keep our regulars happy. We'd also like to get a couple older vintage machines like Asteroids or Defender.
We really also want to get another pinball machine or maybe something like Sega Rally or House of the Dead.
We can't be specific about which machines we'll buy as it's all down to what's available in working condition at the time.

If we don't reach our target, any money we do raise will still be spent buying as much new stuff for the arcade as possible. Not a penny will be left over or wasted.

If we exceed our targets (let's hope), we'll keep buying more stuff. Every single penny raised will be spent on machines, games and spare parts for repairs.

Why Contribute?

We built this place for the community, to meet like minded people and share memories from decade's passed. We also wanted to do our small bit to help preserve some of these classic machines, save them from rotting away in garages and preserve the fun and entertainment they were designed for.
The response we've had from visitors so far has been overwhelming. We really want to keep it going for years to come. There is nothing else quite like us in the whole South West of England.
Our trial lease runs out next spring and we have to give notice by the end of this year whether we will be renewing the lease or not. Which means we now have less than six months to reach our targets so we can renew the lease with confidence.
Meeting our targets and getting the extra machines we want would almost certainly secure the arcade for a further two years at least. If we fall short of these targets, well let's not think about it...

About The Perks

All we really have to offer is free day passes. So anyone looking to contribute should either be local or looking to visit within the next six months.
We have designed some mugs and fridge magnets too, which are pretty cool!

Thank you for reading this. If you decide to contribute, we really appreciate it.
If you are unable to contribute, perhaps help us spread the word so others may find us. We'd be ever so grateful if you did :)

story:
About Shark-it

Shark-it is an entertaining (Android / IOS) game, which promises to bring  the sea breeze over your hands. Fast, funny and addictive game play, Shark-it wishes to be the next awesome game for mobile devices. The first version of the game, comes with 6 fantastic and photo-realistic environments (6 levels), waiting the player to unlock them.

Release date July 2014

Please visit our Gallery Section for more images and more levels.

The Team Behind the scenes

Shark-it is the first creation of an indie game development team (nobelio games), who make their debut with “Shark-it”. Our team attempts a dynamic entry in game industry, creating smart and funny games for mobile devices.

Why to support us

Supporting our Project is so important to us. It gives us the strength to produce our games and offer fun to all of you. Join our family (Nobelio Games) by supporting us and help us actualize our dreams step by step.

About the Funding

All the money goes entirely to the production and completion of the Game.

  • Development fees (programming, sounds)
  • Designing fess (graphics, models, animations)
  • Sounds Composer Expert

Other Ways You Can Help

We absolutely understand that not all of you have the possibility to financially support our idea, even if you want to. Your friendly participation and your good disposal means a lot to us. Any of you that you cannot financially support us, you can help us through Social Media. Share our page to social media websites, and this is a great help to us.

story:
A little story...

Hello everyone! My name is Charles Bodner (LinkedIn) and I am the founder of NXTLVL Gaming Center. I am a graduate of Temple University's Fox School of Business where I double majored in Management Information Systems and Marketing. 

I came up with the idea for NXTLVL after noticing 3 distinct needs in our society:

  1. The need for college scholarships to support students in reducing the cost for college and easing their debt burden.
  2. The need for gamers of all backgrounds to come together and share their passion for gaming in a safe, fun, and afforable environment.
  3. The need for free technology oriented classes to supplement socioeconomic factors that may make it difficult for some to learn needed skills in today's technology driven market.

What is NXTLVL Gaming Center?

NXTLVL Gaming Center is a non-profit cyber cafe where 100% of the proceeds go towards creating college scholarships for technology related studies. We strive to give gamers a safe place to come play their favorite games all while helping others get to the NXTLVL of their education!

So how will NXTLVL accomplish this?

Gaming for a cause: When you play, you give! 

Unlike traditional non-profits, NXTLVL has a business model to support it's efforts. We earn revenue by running a gaming center (or cyber cafe if you will) where visitors will pay a small hourly rate to play. Other revenue streams include optional memberships (with perks), food sales, game trade-ins, direct donations, and grants. 

The goal is to have a variety of game consoles, PCs, and games to encourage gamers from all walks of life and interests to share their passion together while supporting their local community. We will also host regular events and tournaments based off the needs/wants of our customers where they will compete for great prizes, either purchased by us or donated from gaming developers and manufacturers.

We will also host free to the public technology and computer related classes to help those who may not have the resources to learn them otherwise. 

The facts and the impact!

Let's look at some of the facts about today's college education.

  • According to the Bureau of Labor Statistics the average salary for someone who doesn't graduate from college makes almost half of what a person with an associates degree will make.
  • On average, a 2 year degree will earn an individual close to the national average of $41,000 a year.
  • A four year college graduate earns on average $55,000 a year and a master's degree earns $65,000+ a year on average.
  •  Average student debt is $29,000 with the total student debt outstanding at over $1 Trillion! 
  • 35% of all student loans are in delinquency because of their inability to pay for numerous reasons including: poor job market, majors that aren't in demand, and stagnant salaries. (just to name a few)
  • The most wanted/valuable majors today are in the technology and science field: #1 Biomedical Engineering (median pay $97k), #3 Computer Science (median pay $97k), #4 Software Engineering (median pay $87k), #8 Management Information Systems (median pay $88k). (again just to name a few)
After looking at some of these facts we see the need to help students to get into these technology oriented fields. NXTLVL wants to help to achieve this, but in a way that we find fun! Gaming isn't a subculture anymore like it was when most of us were young, it is mainstream and the demand for a unique gaming experience is there! Here's a little snippet from "Video Games, The Movie" explaining just how popular games are in today's culture.  


The Nitty Gritty!

Our goal here is to raise $80,000 which should be an easy task considering how many dedicated gamers we have out there! Now this sounds like alot of money (and it is) but once the startup costs are taken care of, we are left with minimal operational costs. Here is the breakdown of the startup cost:

  • 30 Samsung LEDTV's @ $500 each
  • 30 Lounge Chairs @$250 each
  • 15 XBox 360 @$200 each
  • 15 Playstation 3 @$200 each
  • 10 Refurb Nintendo Wii @$80 each
  • Bulk Game Library Budget @$5,000
  • 1 Year 3,500 square foot Building Lease @$42,000
  • (Currently reaching out to PC manufacturers for 20 donated gaming PC's) not included in the $80k startup cost. 
In terms of projected revenue, we are looking at a conservative year 3 estimate of $175,000 from rental revenue alone. (this is with the assumption we will be operating at an average of 25% capacity year round)


We can only do this with your support!

You guys are the bread and butter! Show us your support by donating financially or by simply sharing this campaign with your friends and family! We are also open to in-kind donations of the required items above! Thank you so much for your support!

15 Playstation 3 @$200 each
10 Refurb Nintendo Wii @$80 each
Bulk Game Library Budget @$5,000
1 Year 3,500 square foot Building Lease @$42,000
(Currently reaching out to PC manufacturers for 20 donated gaming PC's) not included in the $80k startup cost. 

In terms of projected revenue, we are looking at a conservative year 3 estimate of $175,000 from rental revenue alone. (this is with the assumption we will be operating at an average of 25% capacity year round)
We can only do this with your support!
You guys are the bread and butter! Show us your support by donating financially or by simply sharing this campaign with your friends and family! We are also open to in-kind donations of the required items above! Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Welcome to the Indiegogo funding page for Stone Rage. We have reached a point where the alpha phase of Stone Rage is in sight. It has been a long road and it is thanks to the support and ideas from fans like you that we have continued to push forward and make our dream for Stone Rage a reality. We will begin alpha play-testing and bug fixing very soon which will be a huge milestone for the project. Now, while we are getting closer to the alpha phase we need one more push to get us even further. There is still plenty left to accomplish and with the money we make here we will be able to step up our production and get our game into the player’s hands sooner. We truly appreciate your support and thank you all endlessly for your contributions that we receive here. Together we can bring Stone Rage to the foreground of the gaming world and make it the exciting, bone crushing, multiplayer experience it was always meant to be.

Information on the game:
• Game Title: Stone Rage
• Platform: PC
• Genre: Action and adventure
• Theme: Rural Survival
• Camera View: Third Person
• Engine: Unreal Engine 4
• Price: Free-To-Play
• Public Beta Release Date: TBD
• Company: LLC (GmbH) Registered
• Project Started: January 2011

Stone Rage™ is a Free-To-Play online third person multiplayer action game set within the Pleistocene and Eocene eras, featuring prehistoric tribalism, prehistoric landscapes and prehistoric animals. Players will take control of a single character of either a human class, neanderthal tribe or animal genus and wreak havoc in either survival, team objective or deathmatch game types. As players win games and progress through achievements, options in weapon layout, upgrades and personalized character customization will be unlock, giving a large array of choices to those who do not wish to completely conform to a single archetype.

Every character has a set of unique traits and abilities, as well as unlockables to modify their effects and tactical usage, ensuring that no two games will play the same, and no one player is by default more or less dangerous than another. Situation and opportunity play as much a part in winning a game as how well players use their character skills and environment to their advantage. Since tribal skirmishes and hunts take place across a wide stretch of land, players will encounter sprawling forests with prowling smilodon, vast plains with marching mammoth herds and gastornis scavenging the remains left behind by the prey of dire wolves!

 

Animal classes: One of the most boasted qualities about Stone Rage is its animal classes. Stone Rage offers a wide array of animals with different tactics, and abilities that will keep players gaming for days. We have put strenuous effort into picking out the best classes possible to keep players entertained. Our classes include the Entelodont for stealth, the Woolly Rhinocerous for defense, the Gastornis as a scout class, a Cave Bear for warrior class, Saber Tooth Tiger for the hunter class, and finally the Mammoth as the heavy. We also provide support animals for each animal class, which are playable as well.

Human/Neanderthal classes: Stone Rage contains two different groups: the Humans and the Neanderthals. Each group has its own set of six different playable classes. There’s the warrior, the guard, the archer, the hunter, the shaman, and the ubermensch. Each class performs an important role on the battlefield and will be vital in ensuring victory for either the Humans or the Neanderthals.

 

  • Prehistoric era
  • Play as animals
  • Play as cro magnon or neanderthal
  • Use character & animal abilities
  • Explore huge snow, forest, desert, beach, jungle, swamp maps
  • Game Mode: Survival (deathmatch + objectives)
  • Customize your animals & characters
  • Customizeable weapons
  • 32 players multiplayer
  • Dedicated Server System + Matchmaking System
  • Game Mode: Survival (Team / Deathmatch + objectives)

Stone Rage is looking to meet the goal of 60k (55k with ig fee). With this money we will be able to pay our hard working developers for all of their time and dedication for the very first time. We will also be putting this money towards the long list of expenses that come with releasing a game, such as: server and website costs, upkeep, advertisement, and taxes/misc. fees. Reaching our goal of 60k will allow us to get Stone Rage up and running sooner and the further we go beyond that goal, the more we will be able to put towards our development team and advertisements and help Stone Rage to reach even more gamers looking for a gaming experience unlike any other. 

Stone Rage is a game unlike any other. Everything that is going into this game has been discussed and debated over by the entire team to ensure that Stone Rage will be the most unique and well-rounded game on the market. The support given from fans and contributors helps us to further improve the already impeccable structure of a game that is sure to be one of the most talked about experiences to come out of the indie scene in years.

The Stone Rage team is made up of young, hard-working developers that are looking to leave their mark on the ever expanding gaming world. Everyone on the team donates what free-time they have to helping Stone Rage move along at a quick pace, whilst also ensuring that no detail is overlooked. It can be tough for the developers to work around school, work, and family to bring a game of such magnitude together. But your contributions can help us to keep pushing. Most of the funding will be given to this hard working team and will help them to recuperate the many hours put into making Stone Rage a truly amazing experience.

Thank you for taking the time to learn more about our goals as a team and the vision we have for Stone Rage. While your donations help us greatly, it is your support and kind words that keep us going and working hard. We want all who play this game to truly enjoy the experience, and become entrenched in the world that we have dedicated so much time to create. Our passion is making video games that will be remembered years from now and we firmly believe that Stone Rage will be one of those games that people are talking about and playing for decades to come.



Q: When will the Beta version of game be available?
A: Depending on how much funding we receive here. Estimated date: 2014 Q3

Q: How much the game will cost?
A: Nothing at all. It's Free to Play.

Q: Will there be a Singleplayer or Offline gameplay?
A: No. The game is Multiplayer only.

Q: Will you add Matchmaking or dedicated server?
A: We're in the middle of doing dedicated server, but we also plan to add matchmaking for Stone Rage. So, both!

Q: Which and how many races are available to be played?
A: You can choose to play as Human, Neanderthal and Animal genus.

Q: Free to play means 'Pay to win' right?
A:  NO! The items you will buy will in no way give you advantage over the other players.

Q: How many game modes does Stone Rage offer?
A:  The only goal is survival.  We have a variety of scenarios, ranging from a massive fire, to a deadly hunt.  But in each case, only one team will survive (one game mode only)

Q: Will there be updates for Stone Rage?
A: Yes of course, there will be a game launcher bringing you up-to-date with the latest versions of our game build.

Q: Will each faction have different weapons and accessories to unlock?
A: Yes. The Human class has a completely different personality from the Neanderthal tribe and use different techniques and equiment to fight.

Q: Will there be a retail copy of the game available in retails and stores?
A: Currently, we have only planned to release digital copies since our game is Free to Play.

Q: How many maps will be released in the Public Beta game?
A: We have 5 maps announced. Stone Canyon, Deadly Mountains, Beast Arena, Showdown and Continents Edge. More to come!

Q: What are the system requirements?
A: We haven't got a specific system requirements list yet.

Q: Will you be using steam?
A: Currently we haven't planned to use steam. We'll be providing the game to download for free on our website.
