story:
CrumbleyCraft aims to be a friendly modded minecraft experience.

It will always be a safe place for players of all backgrounds to enjoy survival, mini games, role-play and more!

We hope to run Crumbleycraft solely on donations from the community. Crumbleycraft will always be free to play and not pay to win. Donators will receive in-game perks that aren't game-breaking.

Our Goal- 1000$ is to keep Crumbleycraft up and running for at least a year on the highest MC-ProHosting Plan, so we can have unlimited player spaces and enough Memory for a huge amount of mods. It will also go towards funding a mumble channel for server-wide communication.  Any additional money raised will go towards keeping the server up, or upgrading to a dedicated server.
CrumbleyCraft will run a large variety of mods, featuring scary, cute, technical, challenging, silly, and visually pleasing mods. It's very own modpack and resource pack will be available for everyone to play. 
The Role-play featured on the server is a combination of good old fashioned Pokemon game play with the rabid hoards of zombies. Join your friends and their Pokemon teams as you uncover the source of the Apocalypse and stop it before its too late. Who knows, you might become a master trainer in the process...
If questing isn't your forte, explore multiple worlds and build your own fortress with Factions. Forge Alliances and declare war on your enemies. Fill your kingdom with other players and NPCs. Build Families with Minecraft Comes Alive. Bring your enemies to their knees with advanced weaponry from Tinker's Construct, or settle things diplomatically with Clay Soldiers.
Or keep to yourself and enjoy mini-games and events, like gladiatorial combat, massive drop parties, building competitions and much much more!

Have an idea for a perk/reward, or for the server itself? Follow our progress or become involved  @ http://crumbleycraft.tumblr.com/

story:
That's right: without even contributiong today there's a way you can help us. We're looking for anyone who is interested in poker, even just a little bit, to come and play Sponge Poker. It costs nothing to get started, and just requires a Facebook account to sign up and play. (Pretty safe bet that you have one of those already!)

We're confident in our product, and we know that if you play it, there's a good chance you'll enjoy it enough to tell your friends. Inviting them to play though Facebook will earn you chips, and will help us bring more people into the game. More people means a whole lot more fun!

But seriously: it's time we stopped talking about it. If you're a poker person, and if you want to help, come play Sponge Poker!



and you'll see why we'd love to have you play with us.




Sponge Poker is the most realistic online poker game ever created.


In a world full of clone titles, we've developed a truly unique proposition which uses patent-pending technology to bring our players poker games that feel far closer to real life than ever before.

Our interface has been built from the ground up using this proprietary technology. We've created the only betting view where players can see each others' tells. The movements your opponents make as they consider their options are telegraphed right on to your screen. You can watch as Jim contemplates folding, or while Mike thinks hard about going all-in.

And, of course, this means that you can learn to use the interface to fake out your opponents, sending false tells, just like at a real game. The betting interface adds a level of complexity to Sponge Poker that no other game on the market can match, but the game remains easy to get into, and very intuitive.

Easy, and fun, but with an edge: a touch of seriousness. That's Sponge Poker.


Beyond these key players, a number of other people have worked to make Sponge Poker a success. The team full includes coders, writers, consultants, etc. All of these people have worked to make Sponge Poker the success it is today, and it is thanks to the skilled management of the core team that these human resources have been skillfully (and economically) employed in order to get the game developed as quickly and efficiently as possible!



$1: Buy-In

You get a special thank on the Sponge Poker fan page, plus we'll spot you $900 in game chips and 1 Gold.

Chips are awarded each time you buy this perk. Gold is only awarded the first time. 

$5: Small Blind

You get the special thank on the Sponge Poker fan page, but we'll give you $4,500 in game chips and 2 Gold.

Chips are awarded each time you buy this perk. Gold is only awarded the first time. 

$10: Big Blind

The customary thank you, plus a cool $9,000 in game chips and 3 Gold.

Chips and Gold are awarded each time you buy this perk.

$15: Straddle

A very cool—and highly useful—Sponge Poker tournament timer. Plus the fan page thank you, $1,000 in game chips, and 1 Gold. This timer is great for home tournaments, but it can also be used for loads of other things. How about cooking an egg? Let us know what you use it for by sending in a picture and we'll post it on the fan page!



$25: Call

You can get your hands on this fabulous t-shirt which lets the world know you're a Sponge Poker supporter. You'll look stylish in black, and we haven't forgotten to include a thank you, $2,000 in game chips, and 2 Gold. Drop us a pic of you and your new shirt and we'll post it on the fan page!

Size: S, M, L, XL, XXL
Note: a minimum of 100 perk packages including this item must be claimed before the back is printed.


$35: Raise

A stunning Sponge Poker luxury cap. Plus the fan page thank you, $3,000  in game chips, and 3 Gold. Shades your eyes from the sun. Also good for keeping prying eyes off your face in a real life game. Take a pic of you and your hat in action (playing poker, taking a walk on the beach, or whatever) and we'll post it on our fan page!

Size: S/M, L/XL
Note: a minimum of 100 perk packages including this item must be claimed before the back is printed.

$43: See the Flop

A gorgeous pair of poker sunglasses plus a deluge of $4,000 in game chips and 4 Gold. The absolute perfect way to hide your eyes (darn truth-telling eyes) at the table, or to keep the sun out of your face when you stumble out of a serious game at 8am. Take a pic of that walk of shame (or glory) and send it to us. We'll make sure to put it on the fan page!

$58: The Turn

A spectacular Sponge Poker winner's hoodie. Plus the customary thank you, a big old $5,000 block of game chips, and 5 Gold. Want to look stunning as you walk down the street? Need to hide your face while you play? This hoodie will handle your desires. Take a shot of your hoodie getting you into or out of trouble and we'll post it on our fan page!



Size: S, M, L, XL, XXL
Note: a minimum of 100 perk packages including this item must be claimed before the back is printed.

The timer, cap, t-shirt, sunglasses, fan page thank you, $10,000 in game chips, and 12 Gold. Booyah! That's a lot of stuff. Take a picture, it'll last longer. Oh, and we'll definitely post it on the fan page if you send it to us!

 

 

The amazing combo of the timer, t-shirt, cap, hoodie, and sunglasses plus the fan page thank you, $16,000 in game chips, and 20 Gold. This is the pro's pack, and with this kind of kit, we can see you being in the money just on intimidation factor alone. Shoot us a pic and we'll post it up on the fan page!

  

$10,000: Nuts!  

The ultimate package for the true Sponge Poker supporter. You get everything (timer, t-shirt, cap, hoodie, sunglasses, fan page thank you, $1,000,000 in game chips, and 500 Gold) above...and more. Specifically, CEO and creator of Sponge Poker, will come visit you for a day. He will shake your hand. He might bow. He will definitely take pictures with you (for the fan page, of course) and most importantly he will talk to you about the design and development of Sponge Poker. (Plus, there's a good chance he'll play a few hands with you!) It's the kind of day you remember forever, but to help out, we'll make sure that one of the pictures you take with Alex is the cover of our fan page for at least a month!

The ultimate package for the true Sponge Poker supporter. You get everything (timer, t-shirt, cap, hoodie, sunglasses, fan page thank you, $1,000,000 in game chips, and 500 Gold) above...and more. Specifically, CEO and creator of Sponge Poker, will come visit you for a day. He will shake your hand. He might bow. He will definitely take pictures with you (for the fan page, of course) and most importantly he will talk to you about the design and development of Sponge Poker. (Plus, there's a good chance he'll play a few hands with you!) It's the kind of day you remember forever, but to help out, we'll make sure that one of the pictures you take with Alex is the cover of our fan page for at least a month!

story:
JTFM Enterprises / Die Waffenkammer 1/56 scale M26 Pershing Tank.

JTFM Enterprises / Die Waffenkammer has been producing finely crafted 1/56 scale resin cast WWII AFV's for the 28mm wargaming and collecting community for over 5 years. 

To enhance our growing line of vehicles we would like to fund a new master model for a 1/56 scale M26 Pershing tank.

This master model will be constructed by the well known Australian figure sculptor and master builder Mike Broadbent.

Once the funding drive goal of $1250.00 CAD has been achieved construction of the master model will commence. Upon it's completion casting will start and a highly detailed model will be available for 1/56 scale wargaming enthusiasts and collectors.

In return for your contribution you will be able to choose from perks listed on the side menu.

This is a first for us. If this initial project works it will give us the ability to launch further projects to increase the variety of vehicles that we can make available to the WWII gaming community.

So if you have the interest and/or know of others who are WWII gamers or collectors help us by spreading the word !

Shipping is included in all of the perk packages.

story:
Steam /  Discord  / Twitter /  Facebook /  Instagram /  Story Trailer /  Gameplay Trailer

 

Welcome to the Pegasus Galaxy, director. This is The Pegasus Expedition.

In 2262, humankind is at war. Facing an overwhelming threat at home, humanity sends expeditions to the Pegasus Galaxy in a desperate attempt to find a refuge for the population of Earth, only to find themselves in the middle of an interstellar war they inadvertently started.

Lead and manage your fleets and officers, engage in interstellar war and experience a meaningful story campaign in this epic sci-fi grand strategy. You’ll have to make scientific discoveries, explore derelict spaceships, and of course, develop diplomatic relations and a functioning economy to survive the perils of this new mysterious galaxy. You’ll make important decisions with your council as you experience our deep storyline and characters, while fighting against ever worsening odds together with your friends and allies.

 

 

The Pegasus Expedition is a combination of an epic sci-fi story and a solid space grand strategy game. We aspire to provide you with an unique gaming experience, bringing together the best of both worlds.

Our beautiful, ethereal soundtrack will accompany you on your journey as your mission transitions from exploration to governance, conquest, and eventually a fight for your survival.

It is time for you to take the future of the Expedition into your own hands. The Pegasus Galaxy is waiting for you, director.

 

 

Key Features

  • Immense handcrafted world – a replayable campaign set in a rich, vast world.
  • Conflict and tragedy – experience a deep storyline, where no-one is perfect and ends will often have to justify the means.
  • Choose to be the leader you wish to be – face difficult moral choices in difficult times, and suffer their consequences.
  • Rewarding gameplay experience – Versatile 4X gameplay with many different approaches to various challenges the campaign presents.
  • Meaningful diplomacy – a diverse and versatile system with over 30 independent factions in the galaxy.
  • Planning-based combat – manage your warfronts' bigger picture, and weigh which losses you’re willing to take for success.

 

Or copy and paste the link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1521070/The_...

 

 

THE STORY

In 2262, humanity is at war. After almost two centuries of spacefaring and colonization, humankind had achieved permanent presence in a dozen star systems, and colonized six habitable planets.

Back in 2190, a contact had been made with an alien lifeform, soon to be named as “the Colossals”. They were gigantic, interstellar, intelligent and hostile to all other life. It soon became clear that humankind stood no chance against the Colossals. The colonies fell one after another, and by the start of 2260s there was only the Earth left. There weren't many options left, and a desperate plan was chosen as a last attempt to turn the tide of the war.

 

 

All effort was focused on the creation of one portal, that led to a dwarf galaxy called Pegasus. The plan was to expand to this distant galaxy, in the hope of finding something to change the situation back home, be it a new technology or a new weapon. And if no such a miracle would be found, at least it would take the Colossals a hundred years more to reach the Pegasus galaxy, making it a temporary refuge.

 

 

Three main fleets were sent to the Pegasus galaxy: The Zeus Link fleet by the European Union, named after the portal itself, the 1st Expeditionary Fleet from the United States, and Al-Musta’mara fleet from the Daras Combine.

There was no time for careful reconnaissance or preparations; the Colossals were only fifteen years away from the Earth. The first units entered the portal on Sunday 25th of August 2262, with fifteen years of time to find a way to save the Earth.

 

 

The Pegasus Expedition is a combination of an epic sci-fi story and a solid foundation of a space grand strategy game. We aspire to provide you with an unique strategy game experience, bringing together the best from both worlds. Our beautiful, ethereal soundtrack will accompany you on your journey as your mission transitions from exploration to governance, conquest, and eventually a fight for survival.

Building on the legacy of the grand strategy genre, The Pegasus Expedition adds a strong narrative side to the classic 4X-gameplay which involves managing your diplomatic ties, armies, economy and scientific development.

 

 

 

The Pegasus Galaxy has been blooming with intelligent life for a long time. It has its own civilizations, with their own problems and conflicts. The fragile balance reached over time has now been irreversibly shaken by the forceful appearance of a new species - Humans.

 

 

GAMEPLAY

 

 

A Story Driven 4X-game

The Pegasus Expedition is a story driven grand strategy game which focuses on combining an epic sci-fi narrative with a solid 4X foundation to create a very unique narrative strategy game experience. Your decisions and actions shape the galaxy around you, with every alliance and crisis you suffer or cause leaving their mark.

 

 

The Council

As the Director of Zeus Link fleet, you control all aspects of the Zeus Link, making all of your critical decisions with your council; the group of your closest subordinates and advisors. They will inform you of the new developments in the galaxy, and do their part in solving the numerous crises and incidents you will have to resolve, one way or another.

 

 

Economy 

You will start out with only your seasoned but thin expeditionary fleet, and you will need to develop a functioning economy and fast to keep the Expedition going. After all, you will be supplied from home for only so long.   

 

 

Diplomacy in a Torn Galaxy 

The Pegasus Galaxy is full of independent factions, with their own grudges, rivalries and fragile alliances, so you’ll need to navigate this diplomatic landscape with care in order to succeed. That will involve both making dynamic deals and treaties in the diplomacy system, as well as making tough choices in dialogue. After all, you are a suspicious and despised newcomer in this galaxy, with limited time and huge expectations to accomplish. 

 

 

Manage your Fleets and Officers

To survive in this new and often hostile galaxy, it’s extremely important to keep your forces improving and your leaders trained. You will have to work with limited human resources, and choosing the right person for the right job can often make the difference. Assign admirals, governors and special forces operatives to help you to victory.

 

 

Stellar Warfare

War never really changes, and the Pegasus galaxy has a lot of it to offer. Choose your strategies and plan your battles well, as in the Pegasus Expedition’s unique combat, careful planning is everything. Espionage and the well thought out movement of your forces will be crucial in war, in order to have your fleets at the right place at the right time.

 

 

Technology

In the future, there’s an even shinier future ahead. There are great discoveries to be made, and many things, great and less great, that you can do using those discoveries. To have a chance against your foes, you'll need to be one step ahead of them in technology too, and not just in strategy.

 

 

Fight Against the Ever Worsening Odds

Your starting situation is not an easy one... And it’s only going to get worse. The longer the expedition continues, the higher the stakes, with new threats, enemies, backstabbers and heroic resistance movements. Everything to keep the campaign dynamic, interesting, and challenging to the very end. With a plenty of characters, sidequests and twists and turns to the campaign, the dynamic Pegasus Galaxy will present new challenges to face that will keep you on your toes.

 

 

MUSIC

The game features an ethereal sci-fi soundtrack by award winning composer Adam Al-Sawad, which delves deep into melodic ambient in a way never seen before.

Several tracks also feature vocals from Aleksandra Eskelinen aka. Vantorea, which bring a picturesque feel to the soundtrack. With hints of post rock and cinematic influences paired with minimalist techniques throughout the soundtrack, The Pegasus Expedition delivers a narrative experience through its music, telling a story of the struggles and wonders encountered on the player's journey.

 

 

 

PERKS

 

ABOUT PERKS

 

About the shipping:

If shipping is needed (merch tiers only), the shipping costs are calculated when you check out. Only economy shipping is available, and it has no tracking service included. 

Shipping costs (includes packaging, shipping and handling):

Finland: $8
European Union: $17
Rest of the World: $23

Please note that shipping prices do not include possible taxes or import fees that may occur in the destination country.

Perk items will ship out around the time the game releases. We will keep you updated on the manufacturing, handling and shipping processes. Please keep in mind that due to the current covid situation, shipping times may vary and the package may take up to 8 weeks to arrive. We will keep an eye on possible restrictions, and items will be shipped when possible. 

Don’t hesitate to send us email if you have any questions about the items or shipping!
 

Add-ons:

You can add additional copies of The Pegasus Expedition Steam keys as an add-on. Simply add the add-on perk when you check out! The additional copies are $27 each.

Want to add our merch to your order? You can add the add-on perk for merch to any order except for Major General and Head Scientist. Remember to select the right shipping profile before checking out! The merch add-on includes the acrylic standee and the acrylic pin badge.

 

Why Indiegogo?

We’ve been developing The Pegasus Expedition for over a year now. We are an indie team of about ten people, and holding together a team with limited funds is tough. We believe we have a great game taking shape in our hands, and for it to reach its full potential, we’d love to have a bit more time to finish it. We are going to Indiegogo to fund our games further development - we don’t want to rush it through, we want to make it as good as it can be.

We believe in our game project, and believe it’s something special. We need the help of our community to bring this project to life at this full potential. Most of all, we don’t want to let down those people who have been supporting us and this project so far.

We sincerely hope that you, as a part of our community, share this vision and passion to create The Pegasus Expedition. Even if you aren’t able to help us financially, every like and share on social media counts. We are eternally thankful for all of your support. Let’s make this happen together!

We want to be completely transparent with the usage of your money. Therefore we have broken down the budget for you to take a look at:

 

 

OUR TEAM

We, Kalla Gameworks, are a game development studio based in Kuopio, Finland. We are a collective of industry professionals and enthusiasts with a strong focus on immersion and atmosphere and a passion for creating games.

At the moment we employ several people from a range of diverse fields and backgrounds. Together with skills hand picked for our development needs and a unified passion for creating games, we create games to give lasting memories.

 

 

Risks and challenges

As we want to be completely open about the production, there are always possible risks and challenges we might face during the development journey. A successful Indiegogo campaign would give us the time and funds to finish the game on our required quality level.

Obviously when developing a game there is always a chance of unexpected difficulties, obstacles and what-if scenarios. We have already been working on The Pegasus Expedition for over a year now, and we believe that we have already overcome the most critical obstacles. We have planned the use of our remaining time before the release, but it all comes down to the funding of resources and people.

We need time for proper testing and bug finding before we can call the game ready, and the amount of time those take is easily underestimated. Knowing this, we have aimed at taking every possible drawback into account. That way we can minimize the risks for our backers as well.

All that being said, we are thankful beyond measure for everyone who has and will support us on our project and journey.

 

 

Support Us!

You can help us to bring this project to life in different ways

  •  Back our Indiegogo campaign and get cool perks
  • Wishlist us on Steam
  •  Follow us on social media
  • Join our Discord and come chat with us
  •  Share our stuff to your friends and followers!

 

Steam

Twitter

Website

Facebook

Instagram

Discord

Kalla Gameworks

story:
Finnigan Flint and the Opal Gems is a 2.5D open world adventure game with old school zelda ideals, Mega Man style bosses and power ups, and a cute cardboard-y aesthetic. Play as Finnigan Flint, a young rocklin with a taste for adventure as you explore a  wide open 2D world, discover secrets, Fight a variety of baddies and tackle dungeons on a quest to find the pieces of the shattered Grand Opal!

Gameplay Features

  • Explore a dynamic open world filled with both enemies and friends
  • Discover dungeons and defeat bosses to gain new abilities
  • Tackle any challenge in any order, where you go and what you do is up to you!
  • Use your abilities to solve puzzles and complete quests for allies
  • Many secret areas and upgrades to discover

Check out the Website!

Hello! My name is Matt Goles and I'm an indie game developer with over 10 years of experience in the industry. Game development has been my dream and my passion since the age of nine, and I have spent the last two decades focused on achieving the goal of making a name for myself. Currently I have 3 previously released games currently on steam and more notably was a senior programmer for the Bendy and the Ink Machine series of games! 

You can find my previous solo projects here if you’re interested in seeing what I’ve done:

Old Steam Games!

also Talk to me on Twitter! 

I decided to create this Indiegogo campaign as I Would love to be able to work on this project full time! I have recently been laid off from my most recent position and, seeing as Finnigan Flint is about halfway through production, decided to take the leap and try to finish this game properly!

 

But Why Flexible Fuinding?

Nooo I don’t intend on taking what I can get and running away! I chose flexible funding because I plan on finishing this game whether the goal is met or not. This game is very much a true passion project for me, It’s something I've been attempting to make in one form or another my entire career.
Flexible funding for me will basically decide how long it will take to complete the game rather than if it gets completed at all. If by chance the funding goal is met I will be able to work on this game full time, If not I’ll have to find other income in order to , you know, stay alive and all! With either outcome this game will be completed!

The funds will also go toward commissioning a proper beautiful soundtrack which I feel will be a key aspect to the feeling of adventure I want this game to give!

For perks, I want to focus more on involving you in the development process! By donating you can gain access to updates and information that won’t be posted publicly, as well as have a say in decisions about the game!
Also as a backer you can pitch me character designs! If there’s a design I enjoy and use in the game I will fully credit you in a character section of the credits! (along with also being credited as a backer of course!)

For higher tiers I plan on giving you early builds of the game for you to explore and experience as it's being finished!

The biggest risk factor when it comes to development will really be time at this point. The majority of core game systems are already in place, its more down to content creation from here. Funding will allow me to spend more time working on this project but the game is coming out regardless of this campaign's success! YOur support just means it will come out sooner and in better shape!

 

If you can't afford to donate but would still love to help please share this around with folks you think might enjoy it! I hugely appreciate the support no matter what shape it takes!

If you have any questions for the FAQ be sure to let me know!

Thanks for your time and your support! Happy gaming!

For perks, I want to focus more on involving you in the development process! By donating you can gain access to updates and information that won’t be posted publicly, as well as have a say in decisions about the game!Also as a backer you can pitch me character designs! If there’s a design I enjoy and use in the game I will fully credit you in a character section of the credits! (along with also being credited as a backer of course!)
For higher tiers I plan on giving you early builds of the game for you to explore and experience as it's being finished!


The biggest risk factor when it comes to development will really be time at this point. The majority of core game systems are already in place, its more down to content creation from here. Funding will allow me to spend more time working on this project but the game is coming out regardless of this campaign's success! YOur support just means it will come out sooner and in better shape!
 
If you can't afford to donate but would still love to help please share this around with folks you think might enjoy it! I hugely appreciate the support no matter what shape it takes!If you have any questions for the FAQ be sure to let me know!
Thanks for your time and your support! Happy gaming!

story:
Welcome to the Gamerlife Indiegogo campaign page!

We’re a group of gamers out to change the face of the industry. Gamerlife started it’s life in a garage in south Florida as the brainchild of Anthony Shababy, Timothy Hammond, and Suheil AbuHadid. Since then our team has grown to comprise of eight people, all gamers of different types and fans of different genres but united by one thing; gaming. You can learn more about us by reading our individual bios.

Our goal comprises of two distinct parts; local and nationwide. Locally, we’re opening up a LAN center. Here in Vero Beach, FL, there isn’t much to do for teenagers and young adults. We’re going to change that by opening up a LAN center to give them a place to get out and socialize; where they can use gaming as a common ground to develop friendships between people who ordinarily wouldn’t become friends.

On a competitive level, we’re bringing competition gaming to Vero Beach and the surrounding areas. There’s a great competitive scene here in Florida and with the biggest venues being places like Orlando that host major competitions, that can be quite a drive for most. A competitive environment further south would benefit the scene greatly.

Nationwide we’re getting the industry itself involved. We’ve been actively getting in touch with publishers and developers as well as organizations like Child’s Play and the Boys and Girls Club in an effort to better the public’s perception of gaming.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $60,000. This would cover legal costs, website development, equipment, products, and location fees for the LAN center. The breakdown is as follows:

$10,000 - Legal Costs (insurance, licensing, county+state fees, etc.)

$  1,500 - Website Development (domain, design, maintenance, etc.)

$25,000 - Equipment (displays, consoles, games, networking, etc.)

$  5,000 - Products (most of the perks listed would be normal GL products)

$  8,500 - Location Fees (rent, utilities, internet connection, etc.)

$10,000 - Miscellaneous (cover cost of perk awards, furniture for the LAN center, any other small expenses)


If we don’t meet our $60,000 goal, we’ll be using the funds raised to continue moving forward regardless. Equipment can be added over time, so we’d move forward with the rest and add equipment as funds allow. The LAN center will be a big focus, but having the rest of our assets in order is key before we can run the location efficiently, so equipping our location will be the last step.

Now for the fun part; the perks!

Contribution prizes are as follows:

$5 Personal Email thanking you from GamerLife

$10 All of the above plus a GamerLife Sticker
$25 All of the above plus, Wristband, aluminum pen, and mousepad

$     75+ - All of the above, plus a string backpack, lanyard, and H2GO aluminum water bottle

$   150+ - All of the above, plus a 4GB flash drive, and a t-shirt without gamertag


$   200+ - All of the above, but instead of a plain t-shirt, it will personalized with your gamertag/nickname/etc. on the back


$  1000+ - All of the above, plus a personalized acrylic award

$  5000+ - All of the above, plus a custom GamerLife Xbox360 250gb console

$10000+ - All of the above, plus a custom GamerLife 3rd Generation Apple iPad

The Impact

We as gamers have a voice, made evident by the impact we can have on publishers and developers. With the community and industry involvement we’re going to build through Gamerlife, we will change the game (no pun intended.) We can’t do it alone though. We need your help as a community to help get us where we need to go.

Being a contributor to our campaign allows you to be a part of this movement, starting not only locally for us here in Vero Beach, FL, but nationwide as well. All we need is a jump start.

Remember, even if you are unable to make a contribution here on Indiegogo, you can still contribute in other ways. Spread the word on social media sites, link your friends to our Facebook and Twitter pages. Of course, always remember the Indiegogo share tools are at your disposal!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, I am Victor Maillé, also known as Nimbus, and I am the team captain of dnj.
 
We are a team that is competing in the new fps by Nadeo/Ubisoft called Shootmania. It's a fast paced shooter that's a mix between quake and counter-strike.
 
We are gamers that train everyday to make it in the e-sports scene and sadly we didn't qualify in the last tournament to get a trip to IPL5. From friends of the community or the 100 000$ prize pool, we really want to do the trip to vegas.
 
IPL 5(from november 29th till december the 3rd)
 
Some notable achievements from myself in this game(some with the same roster):

Semi-finals IPL PAX qualifiers
[media]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IFDvt7noLB4&... (skip to 6:20 for me)
Semi-finals NASC OPEN #1
[media]http://www.twitch.tv/nasclive/b/333128515[/media]
http://challonge.com/nasc_open_1
finals NASC OPEN #2 http://challonge.com/nasc_open_2
IPL QUAL #3 round of 16(now complexity)
[media]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9prSu7C5-xs&...
IPL QUAL #2 round of 32(had 2 new substitutes again for that tournament) http://challonge.com/ipl5smna2
IPL QUAL #1 round of 32(had 2 substitutes for that tournament) http://challonge.com/ipl5smna1
IGL SHOOTMANIA CUP #3 http://thek1ng.free....esultats&id=342

What We Need & What You Get

What we need is 500$.
 
Now the whole trip is going to cost us about 1700$ but we can afford a big part of that. The 500$ is to help nimbus get from canada to Las Vegas(since his flight alone is 540$).
 
What do you get for donating? Well you get of course the eternal gratitude of us 3 for helping gamers reach their dreams. You can also select from the many perks where you can get from a simple thank you, nimbus doing crazy break dance moves while wearing a horse mask at IPL 5(video included) or some lessons.
Why should we help you guys?
  •     Organizer of a weekly shootmania tournament called NASC
  •     One of the most helpful/respecting team in the shootmania community. We pride ourselves in trying to play professionally while helping others and not leaving them with degrading comments.
  •     We have been there on different teams since very early in the beta(the start for me personally) and we have worked hard for an event that we finally didn't qualify for(since we were a newly assembled team and had a lack of experience with this roster)
  •     We are trying to grow the shootmania community and IPL 5 could help us get a better leverage to better help this game become a success.
  •     We are considered a very good team even if we are a newly made one. Top teams comes to us for scrims and we do well in them. We will prove our worth with a chance like this.
  •     You get some perks if you help us

The Impact

Shootmania has a lot of potential to step into the future of e-sports. With major tournaments like IPL and ESWC already, while only in the beta, shows promise. Big teams like fnatic, millenium, epsilon, infused, sk gaming, just to name a few, are already competing in this game.
 
You will help us grow the North-American shootmania community by adding another team to the ones competing at the IPL. We are already really involved in the community(maker of the NASC weekly tournament, tutorials. many threads and more) and would have the leverage to continue in the future to influence this e-sport.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate money, please help us by sharing this to your friends!

story:
Stack Em Up could finally be here, but we need your help! If you love the classic game “Stacker” as seen in movie theaters, arcades, and bowling alleys and you think it’s a rocking good time, then you’ll definitely want this game on the itouch, iphone, or ipad. Similar to the original Stacker game; you can now keep practicing for the real thing! This itouch, iphone, and ipad version will be even more fun than the original but that’s a surprise! This game is lots of fun for the whole entire family. Stack Em Up has wonderful prizes. You will feel like you are at an arcade or a carnival. Earn tickets and have fun with this wonderful game! Some prizes you can earn are like: electronics, candy, and much more!

You start out with three boxes and you tap on the screen to stop the blocks moving. You want to stack them up in a vertical line all the way to the top as far as you can go. If you miss stacking the blocks one on top of the other, than you lose a block each time. If you keep going farther up, then it gets faster and harder. The number of available squares is automatically reduced to two, then one, during the game as you get higher and higher. Your goal is to go all the way up to either the minor prize or the major prize.

Stack Em Up is a game that you won’t want to ever stop playing. This game is a total blast to play and it will help you when you get to play the real stacker game. So how far can you go? Help us out right now! Fund the Stack Em Up Itouch, iphone, and ipad game application by donating large amounts of cash so you can be playing this fast, moving, exciting, and quick-action skill game.

Please donate one dollar or more if you like this idea at all. If not, do not donate anything. I really need your feedback and it’s highly appreciated!

story:
What is Dire Gazebo?

There are plenty of tools that allow players and GMs to view a map or talk in real time, over the internet but far fewer tools to allow players and GMs to store and share their character sheets online. I intend to create a fantastic tool that can be used either on its own or in conjunction with other apps to create a fantastic experience both online and at the gaming table. 

I have been playing tabletop RPGs for several years and using interactive character sheet PDFs for a while but I have always felt that they did not contain all the information I need. For this reason I started working on a web based character sheet which I dubbed the dire gazebo character forge.

Since then I have expanded my plans to include a suite of GM's tools including initiative/combat tracking, random encounter & treasure generation and NPC & monster stats for easy inclusion in encounters.

This will also include the ability for DMs to silently view players' character sheets in order to add experience, roll save/skill checks and make any other changes as needed without needing to take the sheet off the player or keep an updated list of common rolls.

 

I aim to make all of this available for free to players and DMs with the potential for premium features and bonus content to be available for a small cost in order to cover server fees but to do this, I need your help!

Dire gazebo is flexible!

For many players and GMs, flexibility is the most important thing. It is this idea of flexibility and the aim to create a fantastic online tool, which is useful even for those of us that don't use maps, that this project is based on.

I aim for the system to include large amounts of OGL content inbuilt into the system but it will also be possible for users to create spells, items, effects and pretty much anything else through a simple interface that will allow stats, skills etc. to be affected as needed. 

This will be the exact same system as I will be using to input the OGL content. I aim for it to make anything within the mechanics of the pathfinder system possible.

What I need to complete the site

A large amount of the functionality is already complete but it just needs a push to get finished. I have chosen to use flexible funding because any amount of money will allow me to spend time working on the project but the more I get, the more time I can afford to spend on this. I believe $1000 should be enough for me to complete the project in a reasonable amount of time as I will be able to afford to dedicate myself to it fully.

More funding may allow extensions such as the following:

  • iOS/Android tablet apps? - These would aim to support offline use of character sheets among any other potential perks of the touchscreen environment.
  • Support for systems other than Pathfinder?
  • Integration with a separate 'virtual tabletop' to create a truly complete experience for those that want it?

 

If I fail to reach the full amount I will still work on the site, it may just take longer to complete and a first launch may be missing a few features.

Who am I?

I am a computer science undergraduate. I have been doing web development in various forms for over 5 years and android development for the past year. I have been playing various tabletop RPGs for most of my life, off and on and firmly believe that the inclusion of technology, whether that is laptops, tablets or something else at the gaming table is a powerful thing. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute any money but want to see this project completed you can still help:

  • Spread the word to your gaming group, facebook friends, twitter follower and anyone else you can.
  • Message me with ideas for features and improvements you would love to see. If enough people want something I will try to include it.

The legal stuff

Remember that the site will be free for all to use. This is an attempt to raise the money to finish the project and none of these supporter levels will be required to use the site and its OGL content.

I am not associated with Paizo Publishing, LLC. in any way.

This project uses trademarks and/or copyrights owned by Paizo Publishing, LLC, which are used under Paizo's Community Use Policy. We are expressly prohibited from charging you to use or access this content. This project is not published, endorsed, or specifically approved by Paizo Publishing. For more information about Paizo's Community Use Policy, please visit paizo.com/communityuse. For more information about Paizo Publishing and Paizo products, please visit paizo.com.

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I am Joshua Jones and one of the main developers of the Ragnarok Rising TCG.  I have been playing TCGs/CCGs since about the time Beta came out for Magic: The Gathering and have been hooked since.  For years, friends and I have talked about adjusting various home rules and cards to M:tg, but I have always wanted to make my own.  When a friend of mine, DA Roberts, wrote an amazing zombie story, I felt like this was my chance to make something amazing and fresh.

I have spent the last several months working with another friend and DA, specing out new cards, rules, mechanics, etc for this game.  Right now, I am about to enter the Beta testing phases so we can tweak out the final rules.  This is where you good people come in.  Your money will help me get beta decks and final print decks up and going to be presented to an already interested publisher.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am asking for the minimum $500 because I know that will get me where I need to be to get these decks printed as well as the software I need to finalize the cards.
  • As far as my rewards for your hard earned money being donated to me, I will be offering finalized decks, printing by us and there for will be limited editions.  I will also offer the ability to help create a card based on you or an idea you have, copies of the books, and have the honor of being written in as a character in the next book!  How awesome is that!
  • If in the case I am not able to reach my goal, any funds will still go towards printing and rewards will still be given.

The Impact

  • I know many of DA's followers will have found themselves here and will know how awesome this could be and will know how this will further the Ragnarok Rising Saga.  To those just learning about Ragnork Rising, I am certain you will enjoy the story and soon the game.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • And be sure to use the sharing tools!

Links

DA Roberts-

https://www.facebook.com/RagnarokRisingTheAwakening

http://ragnarokrising.weebly.com/

https://www.facebook.com/ragnarokrisingtcg

What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for the minimum $500 because I know that will get me where I need to be to get these decks printed as well as the software I need to finalize the cards.
As far as my rewards for your hard earned money being donated to me, I will be offering finalized decks, printing by us and there for will be limited editions.  I will also offer the ability to help create a card based on you or an idea you have, copies of the books, and have the honor of being written in as a character in the next book!  How awesome is that!
If in the case I am not able to reach my goal, any funds will still go towards printing and rewards will still be given.



The Impact
I know many of DA's followers will have found themselves here and will know how awesome this could be and will know how this will further the Ragnarok Rising Saga.  To those just learning about Ragnork Rising, I am certain you will enjoy the story and soon the game.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
And be sure to use the sharing tools!



Links
DA Roberts-
https://www.facebook.com/RagnarokRisingTheAwakening
http://ragnarokrising.weebly.com/
https://www.facebook.com/ragnarokrisingtcg

story:
Welcome Back to DruCon 2016!

We tried this once and ALMOST MADE IT. Lets try this again. ONCE MORE WITH FEELING PEOPLE!

Background

Once upon a time, there was a St. Louis-based podcast called Fear the Boot. Along with putting out a consistently high-quality podcast, Fear the Boot fostered a massive online community. This community grew so large and varied that the hosts of Fear the Boot decided to throw an annual gaming convention, lovingly called Fear the Con. Fear the Con came back again and again, eight years in a row! And then the hosts of Fear the Boot decided to take a well deserved rest, and decided to postpone Fear the Con 9 for a year.

But the community that had grown up around Fear the Boot wanted more! Instead of demanding more from the hosts, however, several members of that community took it upon themselves to run their OWN convention, right around the same time as Fear the Con, but with its own flavor and personality. Thus, DruCon was born!

DruCon is really a labor of love. We decided we can't go a whole 730 days without seeing our Fear the Boot family, so we are putting this together so we don't have to!

What We Plan to Do

Didn’t you read the last section? We’re putting on a convention! We’ve named it DruCon in honor of the Drury Inn, our home away from home in Maryland Heights. True, the convention won’t be at that particular Drury Inn (see our Facebook page for more details), but the Drury we’ll be at is larger, with plenty of meeting rooms and no pesky drive at the end of the night. It’ll be two days of gaming, morning until evening, with the same folks you know and love from Fear the Cons past.


Which folks? Well, there’s your erstwhile organizers, Adam (more Alpha than Chad), Bob (runs ScoobyThulhu), and Derek (Mr. Fear the Charity). There’s YOU, the community. Veteran artist and designer Ruben Smith-Zempel will be designing a poster and t-shirt for the event. And Fear the Con regular Mikey Mason will be there to BLOW OUR MINDS.

What We Need and Why We Are Crowdfunding To Get It

The fact of the matter is, using the meeting rooms at the Drury is not free. By the same token, we understand that the hotel is not free on YOUR end. So no matter how much we raise, the convention is happening, and we'll make up the difference, but we would rather not have to.

We ask that you donate only what you think you can reasonably afford. Do not break the bank, just put in what you can! If we get more than we need, we will put the overages right back into the convention! More money raised means stretch goals, more gaming room, saving for a gaming convention next year, etc.

Stretch Goals

1000+? To be revealed....

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Enkeli, I am an independent designer, I enjoy making mods for games especially Age Of Empires, but unfortunately my work consumes me to be able to do a job for the whole community that people have wanted for years and That's why I turn to this.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

My idea is based on the original game Age of Empires II HD on Steam, create a Total Conversion Mod, where each civilization is completely different from each other, that each civilization has its own different units and buildings. Already enough to see European soldiers with the Aztecs and Japanese, to see variety, that is beautifully aesthetic, but mainly that the gameplay is intact.

  I use programs like Micro Poser to create the units, with everything I learned from civilizations forums and use 3ds max for buildings, I have all licensed and I plan to use my knowledge in the area of design to make many players dream come true Of Age of Empires

 Currently in six months of work I have completed the civilizations of Spain, England, France and the Aztecs and soon I will have finished the Celts, but time consumes me and I do not want to leave this work forgotten.

That is why I ask for your support, both from the community of Age Of Empires who support me to create this for you. I will stop my work as an independent designer for a month and dedicate myself full time to do this work if we manage to reach the goal, but even if we surpass it I will also dedicate myself to making the civilizations of the new expansions, I ask for their support so that I can Leave aside some time for my work and do this for you, and enjoy it, make this dream come true that many have had for years and that I can make reality before the summer of this year.

 My work is of a quality different from what you see in many forums and you can try it since a Beta version is already available on Steam but I will list a list of changes:

* New land * New Gaia created 100% by me 

* New, more beautiful and realistic textures 

* Remastering the original campaigns, making the same more difficult 

* New, more beautiful icons * Each unit will be different 

* Provisions for artillery 

* Fully compatible with multiplayer

* Fully compatible with all languages 

* And many more things that will revive that passion for this game.

story:
Stellar Stars passionately cooks the best of Multiplayer Online Battle Arenas (MOBAs) and Rogue-lites together, empowering you with the ability to level up in direct and interactive ways, while fighting other players in a sci-fi & fantasy 8-bit world with procedurally generated stages. 

 


If you think that this is like any other game, think again.

Experience our demo for yourself - you will be surprised.


Estimated Release: Q3 2016

Platforms:


Quotes:

"Looking awesome for such an early alpha!" - Indie


"What’s cool is that these spells can only be used if you collect them in the map or after defeating a neutral enemy, the latter being one of the most enjoyable moments in MOBA games." - Haogamers


"I have only played briefly during Gamestart but I have to say I was impressed for the most part" - AGamingNation


"Controls felt responsively tight for the most part, and like any good roguelite promises a learning curve that demands skill to progress. The music’s pretty sweet, too" - GameAxis


"Looks good! I like games that have this clean look. We don’t have enough Japanese indie games on steam. I will definitely buy, since I play a lot of platformers!” - Zeebrax


“Stellar Stars is an indie platformer which i really did like and i hope you like it” - TechnoGamer


We are fully committed to bring you the full experience of Stellar Stars. With that in mind,

Our campaign is set to Fixed Funding. In other words, this is exactly the same as Kickstarter.

If we do not get funded, you will get your money back.

                    

Meet David. He is a game developer with dreams of creating games which everyone can enjoy. 

His plans are foiled when one day, a mysterious portal brings him into the game world that he created.

Now the only way to return to his world is to search for the Star of Records, a legendary existence said to house the memories of everything in the world.

As you fight your way across other players, minions and bosses, you may come to understand why a game developer is stuck in his game in the first place.


Marry two popular genres, take the best out of them and give birth to a game that sets new definitions for them. That is what Stellar Stars is about. And it just works. 

You get the fun and excitement from battling opponent players in a competitive, fast-paced arena in your quest to reach the top leagues. 

The procedurally generated nature of Rogue-lites makes each match a new experience and requires you to quickly think on your feet on how best to maneuver the stages and defeat the other players.


Cooked with passion, these are the game mechanics that make Stellar Stars special:


Fast-Paced Competitive Arena & Procedurally Generated Stages

The combat in Stellar Stars is fast-paced and is constantly changing depending on the world and the minions of it.

You are empowered with:

Basic Wave Attack for high speed ranged attack

Spells for more damage and additional effects


Special Skills that are unique to each of the playable characters


Trophies And League Ranking Ladder

Grab trophies by winning matches! Start from bronze and climb your way up to the top leagues. Become the top 10 in the world if you can!


Learning Character Growths

The essence of Stellar Stars is improving your character in direct and interactive ways through character growths when you level up: increasing your sprinting speed, improving your jumping height and more.

Character growths comes in many forms. From Runner's Feet, which increases your running speed, to Sinker, which accelerates your falling down from reaching the highest point after jumping, they can change how you play Stellar Stars every time.

  +    =  


Unlock-able Characters

When you play Stellar Stars for the first time, you start with the first playable character - Beat.

Armed with equal amounts of health and mana, Beat is your beginner-friendly and the most balanced character in Stellar Stars.  Beat's special skill, the 5-hit combo, releases a furry of attacks on the nearest opponent!

In addition to Beat, you can play as the other characters once you have completed the requirements to unlock them!

Depending on the unlock-able character, you could either defeat a boss or collect enough stars to unlock them!


Crazily Challenging Bosses

What? There are bosses too? Stellar Stars comes packaged with a story mode where you get the chance to challenge crazy bosses. Besides having a huge amount of health, bosses in Stellar Stars comes packaged with an arsenal of varied attacks. From creating earthquakes to breathing out ice, they are not to be reckoned with.

In addition to having multiple attack patterns, bosses in Stellar Stars have the ability to spawn minions!

And what's to stop a boss from teleporting to right above you?


The soundtrack is composed by the extremely talented Bibiki. He is also the music composer for Retro Pixels Castle. Check out the Stellar Stars main theme track that he have composed on Soundcloud:




WhiteSponge is a small team of fun-loving game crafters. We believe that it's important that you really enjoy the experience of playing the games we make.

We are a young game studio and we can get quite crazy about things we care about. If we see something in a game that we are not satisfied with, rest assured that we are the ones who will tear it down and reconstruct it from scratch. 

We believe that anything is possible as long as we are open to learning and be transparent to new experiences. So we are constantly trying out new things to create better gameplay experiences for you. 


    David 'Xk' Lin - Game Director, Designer, Programmer

A Bachelor in information systems management passionate about crafting games. Part-time pixel artist and game developer for over 4 years.

He wears many hats for Stellar Stars: character design, game development and sprite art. He likes pizza and cheese. Who doesn't?


    Keyon 'Ky' Guo - Game Artist

An undergraduate currently pursuing a bachelor in fine arts who loves painting in both online and offline mediums. 

He is unable to live without a cobalt blue in his life.


    José Ramón "Bibiki" García - Music Composer

A college student who was born with magical music-composing abilities! You can hear his music in the trailers and he is also the music-composer of the entire sound track of Stellar Stars. He is constantly improving and it's rather obvious that he is the man of the music for Stellar Stars!


    Brayden Hurrell 'Anasasi' - Dedicated Game Tester

A student currently studying a diploma in game design, a designer at heart and a gamer at the soul level. He tends to spend too much time playing games rather than participating in real life. Striving to one day design games… 

…and then break them.  

As he does with any other game, quite frequently.



$1 USD - Everything Helps! 

You want to help us but you can't afford much. It's ok! You'll get a       personal email from us by the end of this campaign!


$5 USD - Star Contributor

Thank you for your support! As a token of our gratitude, you will get a special Stellar Stars wallpaper after the campaign is over + all previous rewards!

$10 USD - Preemptive Star Collector

EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT! You'll get a Steam Key, a DRM-free copy of Stellar Stars + all previous rewards!


$13 USD - Star Collector

Get the game when it's done. Not only do you get a Steam Key, you also get a DRM-free copy of Stellar Stars + all previous rewards! Nice!


$25 USD - Star Explorer

Get access to the beta version of Stellar Stars via early access and get your name showcased in the game's credits! Includes all previous rewards too! Sweet!

$30 USD - Preemptive Star Tracker

EARLY BIRD DISCOUNT! Love the music of Stellar Stars? Then grab this tier before it runs out! You get the full soundtrack together with the digital copy of the Stellar Stars Art Book! Includes all previous rewards too! Awesome! 
$40 USD - Star Tracker

Missed the early bird Star Tracker discount? No worries! This tier gets you everything from the Preemptive Star Tracker tier!


$50 USD - Star Guide

You get a digital game guide complete with enemy, lore and exclusive content! Includes everything from the Star Tracker tier too!


$60 USD - Star Secret Seeker

As a star secret seeker you will receive a special edition of Stellar Stars  that includes an additional hidden playable character! You will also get everything from the Star Guide tier! There's only 200 available!???

$80 USD - Star Follower

You get a signed poster shipped directly to you (sometime after the campaign ends)! You will also get everything from the Star Secret Seeker tier!

$100 USD - Star Premium Follower

In addition to getting everything from the Star Follower tier, you will also receive an exclusive T-Shirt/Plushie(soft toy) designed by us! We will reveal the design as the campaign progresses! Can't wait!

$120 USD - Star Personalizer

You get a personalized avatar of yourself in Stellar Stars style for your social networks plus everything from the Star Premium Follower tier!


$150 USD - Star Dropper

Turn yourself into a drop loot! Decide what effect (which doesn't upset the game's balance) you want to have when picked up! Plus you get everything from the Star Personalizer tier too!

$200 USD - Star Carver

You get your name carved in a specific place in Stellar Stars plus everything from the Star Dropper tier!


$250 USD - Star Avatar

Become one of the NPCs that speak and guide players in Stellar Stars! Plus you get everything from the Star Carver tier!


$350 USD - Star Spell Researcher

Help us design and name an unique spell in Stellar Stars! You also get everything from the Star Avatar tier! Magical!


$700 USD - Star Creator

Get together with us and create a custom minion! Customize its behavior and give it an attack skill that you want! You will also get everything from the Star Spell Researcher tier!

$1000 USD - Star Challenger

Become a secret character! Get together with us to decide how your character will look and feel like, not to mention the traits and special skill! And you get everything from the Star Creator tier too!

$2000 USD - Star Hero

Become part of the team and design a secret world filled with new species of minions! You will also get everything from the Star Challenger tier! You will have regular sessions with us to create this secret world! Starting from conceptualizing the world to implementing it, it's the full course menu! Become a hero with this tier!

Why did we start this campaign?

This campaign helps us make our dream come true. While Stellar Stars isn't our first game, our dream is to create an awesome gameplay experience for you. Our passion is in crafting games and we want to express this through Stellar Stars. 

Stellar Stars has a lot of emphasis on gameplay mechanics which makes it a much bigger game than it seems to be. And making a game of this scale requires a lot of money and working part-time on it simply doesn't cut it.

We are fully committed and have always been puttin in everything that we have into creating Stellar Stars. However, we do not want to just ask for money. We want you to be a part of this journey. We want your voice and opinion in Stellar Stars. 

We want your entire journey with us to be as transparent as possible. And that's why we often have live game development streams on TwitchTV!

And as part of being open and transparent, here is a chart that breakdowns how the funds will be distributed:




Why $5000?

$5000 is the bare minimum we need to survive for the coming months. Once we are able to finish Stellar Stars and release it ourselves, everything should be alright!

We will also be showing Stellar Stars at as many game conferences and exhibitions as we can. With your support and contribution, hopefully we will reach our goal - releasing a finished Stellar Stars to you!



How often will updates come by?

We actually release new game patches twice every week! So we will also be showing everything that we have created when that happens. Stay tuned and feel free to ask us anything in the comments!

What about PS3/4, XBox 360/One and Wii U?

We'll try our best to release Stellar Stars to as many platforms as possible. But for the moment, we're focused on Windows, Mac and Linux only. We'll update you if this changes.

Will the game be translated to other languages?

Yes! In fact, in addition to being released in English, Stellar Stars will be translated to Japanese and Mandarin/Chinese. Localization to other languages are not excluded too.


Creating a game as an independent team of game developers comes with its own risks. Possible risks such as not having enough money and not being prepared for unexpected events can happen. 

However, we have actually spend a lot of time preparing and making sure that we spend the money and development time as how we have planned it. David comes from an IT background and has many years of experience in managing projects so he knows how to handle a small team.


Want to interact with us directly and see how the game is being made? Or just want to ask us anything about Stellar Stars? Watch our TwitchTV channel when we go live multiple times every week! Our regular live streaming schedule is as follows:

Monday: 10pm to 12pm EST

Tuesday: 10pm to 12pm EST

Wednesday: Tentatively

Thursday: 10pm to 12pm EST

Friday: Tentatively

Saturday: Tentatively

Sunday: 10pm to 12pm EST



If you like what you are seeing, and you want to help make Stellar Stars a reality, spread the word by telling your friends, your family and the world! Without you, we would not be here today. We are grateful for your support and we want you to be part of this journey!

So let's create Stellar Stars together!

You get a signed poster shipped directly to you (sometime after the campaign ends)! You will also get everything from the Star Secret Seeker tier!$100 USD - Star Premium Follower
In addition to getting everything from the Star Follower tier, you will also receive an exclusive T-Shirt/Plushie(soft toy) designed by us! We will reveal the design as the campaign progresses! Can't wait!$120 USD - Star Personalizer
You get a personalized avatar of yourself in Stellar Stars style for your social networks plus everything from the Star Premium Follower tier!$150 USD - Star Dropper
Turn yourself into a drop loot! Decide what effect (which doesn't upset the game's balance) you want to have when picked up! Plus you get everything from the Star Personalizer tier too!$200 USD - Star Carver
You get your name carved in a specific place in Stellar Stars plus everything from the Star Dropper tier!

$250 USD - Star Avatar
Become one of the NPCs that speak and guide players in Stellar Stars! Plus you get everything from the Star Carver tier!$350 USD - Star Spell Researcher
Help us design and name an unique spell in Stellar Stars! You also get everything from the Star Avatar tier! Magical!$700 USD - Star Creator
Get together with us and create a custom minion! Customize its behavior and give it an attack skill that you want! You will also get everything from the Star Spell Researcher tier!$1000 USD - Star Challenger
Become a secret character! Get together with us to decide how your character will look and feel like, not to mention the traits and special skill! And you get everything from the Star Creator tier too!$2000 USD - Star Hero

Become part of the team and design a secret world filled with new species of minions! You will also get everything from the Star Challenger tier! You will have regular sessions with us to create this secret world! Starting from conceptualizing the world to implementing it, it's the full course menu! Become a hero with this tier!




Why did we start this campaign?


This campaign helps us make our dream come true. While Stellar Stars isn't our first game, our dream is to create an awesome gameplay experience for you. Our passion is in crafting games and we want to express this through Stellar Stars. 
Stellar Stars has a lot of emphasis on gameplay mechanics which makes it a much bigger game than it seems to be. And making a game of this scale requires a lot of money and working part-time on it simply doesn't cut it.
We are fully committed and have always been puttin in everything that we have into creating Stellar Stars. However, we do not want to just ask for money. We want you to be a part of this journey. We want your voice and opinion in Stellar Stars. 
We want your entire journey with us to be as transparent as possible. And that's why we often have live game development streams on TwitchTV!
And as part of being open and transparent, here is a chart that breakdowns how the funds will be distributed:





Why $5000?
$5000 is the bare minimum we need to survive for the coming months. Once we are able to finish Stellar Stars and release it ourselves, everything should be alright!
We will also be showing Stellar Stars at as many game conferences and exhibitions as we can. With your support and contribution, hopefully we will reach our goal - releasing a finished Stellar Stars to you!




How often will updates come by?
We actually release new game patches twice every week! So we will also be showing everything that we have created when that happens. Stay tuned and feel free to ask us anything in the comments!
What about PS3/4, XBox 360/One and Wii U?
We'll try our best to release Stellar Stars to as many platforms as possible. But for the moment, we're focused on Windows, Mac and Linux only. We'll update you if this changes.
Will the game be translated to other languages?

Yes! In fact, in addition to being released in English, Stellar Stars will be translated to Japanese and Mandarin/Chinese. Localization to other languages are not excluded too.


Creating a game as an independent team of game developers comes with its own risks. Possible risks such as not having enough money and not being prepared for unexpected events can happen. 
However, we have actually spend a lot of time preparing and making sure that we spend the money and development time as how we have planned it. David comes from an IT background and has many years of experience in managing projects so he knows how to handle a small team.


Want to interact with us directly and see how the game is being made? Or just want to ask us anything about Stellar Stars? Watch our TwitchTV channel when we go live multiple times every week! Our regular live streaming schedule is as follows:
Monday: 10pm to 12pm EST
Tuesday: 10pm to 12pm EST
Wednesday: Tentatively
Thursday: 10pm to 12pm EST
Friday: Tentatively
Saturday: Tentatively
Sunday: 10pm to 12pm EST





If you like what you are seeing, and you want to help make Stellar Stars a reality, spread the word by telling your friends, your family and the world! Without you, we would not be here today. We are grateful for your support and we want you to be part of this journey!
So let's create Stellar Stars together!

story:
Making a qualitative leap forward quality and modernity without your help can be almost an impossible proyect. Working with new materials and techniques is a quite expensive and hard, in addition we count with the best artists and professionals in each field to produce best goods. Quality, Professionalism and Exclusiveness are a daring bet but we aren't okay with good products, we want them to be exceptional! That's why we need your support and comments.






We are proud of working with best professionals. The team behind this great and ambitious proyect, is one of our principal guarantee:

Sergio Alonso (Sergus): Designer, sculptor, illustrator...One of the best artist in the Fantasy Football scene. He is responsable of the design and drawing of most of our products.
David Lanza (Monkey Studio): Illustrator and designer with a great skill to make unbelieving scenarios. He is responsible for our amazing pitches and benches.
Sergi Torras (Virgil Games): One of the best (if not the best) 3D spanish sculptor. His skill and professionalism are the reasons to become the trend 3D designer.
Sukubus Studio (Laia and Ian): With their style and personality, their works are pretty recognizable. They are among best spanish 3D sculptors.
Álvaro Ramírez: Illustrator and designer, is responsible for the art of this campaign.

Product Quality is very important for us. From the beginning, we are working with best professionals to offer great merchandise. Our friends of 3DA will print 3d greens with finest accuracy. Miniaturas Alemany will cast quality pieces that you will receive in your homes. For pitches, we count with an european supplier with big experience that garantee best results.

Chaos Factory wants to bring creativity and design to the Blood Bowl’s world. Our aim is to improve this great game with high-quality artistic products. An inventive and unique approach to the products is our way to achieve it.

The founder of Chaos Factory is Jordi, myself! Or Shumy, as I am also known amongst players. I’ve been playing for more than 12 years, and I really like painting and sculpture. Whenever I receive and order, I look for uniqueness and perfection. Paint brush and putty are my best allies!

Because we are not just another brand. Alternative miniature brands are spreading, but we offer an entirely new sort of game accessories. We value details and provide creativity, thus upgrading the game experience.  Scoreboards, Bases, Accessories, Trophies and Medals are part of our exclusive collection. Because… Player does not live by miniatures alone!


Estimate Shipping date >> February 2016

Shipping is not included in the perks.
Shipping will be added after campaign ends in the aftercampaign process.

story:
Short Summary

Hi I'm Mike Hibbert and I'm the lead developer and project manager for La Vida an open source game much like The Sims which will be available for free under the GPL3 open source licence. Thats free for everyone to download and play!

La Vida lets you control the life of your 'Dude' or 'Dudette', having them interact with the world you create and the community of Dudes you control.

The La Vida project has been a labour of love for me but as time has gone by I've been unable to continue developing because of my day job getting in the way.

To develop La Vida to playable state would take me a year of fulltime development and a bunch of freelance 3d artists to create content for the game itself.

Without funding this very much requested project can't progress. 

What We Need & What You Get

To develop the game to a fully playable and enjoyable experience that can be played on Windows, Mac & Linux, (possibly even mobile if I can fit it in!) I will need the proposed funding to cover my living costs for 12 months and the costs of paying some freelancers to make 3d models/animations, music and artwork

Users will be able to download a full playable game with free content and open source artwork, models and music so they can even hack the game into something new if they want to!

Features include:

  • Sandbox - build you home any way you want!
  • Editable Terrain - landscape all you want!
  • Expanable activities - new activities can be included as they are developed
  • Import you Dude into you friends game!

 

The Impact

La Vida is a a very much requested game that users on Windows, Mac and Linux would love to enjoy, checkout the unbuntu forums thread which has been going for 4 years now!

http://www.la-vida-game.co.uk/

Thousands upon thounds of people want this game to happen!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute cash please share this page on Facebook or Twitter ( buttons are above! )

If you're a 3d or 2d artist or musician or you can make sound effects then we'd love you to contribute!

 

The way forward...

Well theres lots to be done ... all we need is the time to do it!

Whats in the plan:

Take the existing code and convert it to use a more well supported graphics platform in the initial months.

Once thats complete there is support for interaction with household objects so that activities can be performed.

Work needs to be done later to provide feedback to the player about events, their status in the game and loads more!

Your contribution will make all of this possible and more!

story:
Let them play

Mineblock is a device that gives parents an easy way to let their children play Minecraft safely. Set up Mineblock on your home network, then your kids and their friends can easily log into the Mineblock game environment and play without the possibility of strangers interrupting their game. 


How does it work?

Once plugged in, Mineblock looks for a network to connect to. If your network is password-protected Mineblock creates its own temporary network which can be accessed by phone or laptop, allowing you to log Mineblock in to your network. Once restarted, Mineblock connects to your network and provides a Minecraft gaming environment. Crafters will be able to log into the game by typing in Mineblock’s IP address into their laptops.

Do you see the value in having children play Minecraft?
Do you also see the possible harm that kids can endure when on public Minecraft games?

Then Mineblock is for you and you're the kind of person we’d like supporting our project.

Minecraft can allow for "Open to LAN" games but they are dependant on a single gaming console to exist. What if you want the Minecraft gaming environment to not be dependant on any one player, Mineblock solves this problem. It's a gaming environment that is persistent at a fraction of the cost of Minecraft hosting services.

As a dad, I was concerned with griefing or bullying in Minecraft and wanted to find a way to solve it. As a designer I see a larger opportunity to solve the same issue for any parents of little Minecrafters. With your help we can bring Mineblock to parents and children around the world. Personally, I believe in the creative transformation that happens to children when playing Minecraft, it’s not like other games in that way, I wouldn’t want that experience ruined by some stranger behaving inappropriately.

Contribute to Mineblock now and help children around the world play Minecraft multiplayer games without the threat of bullying.

By contributing to our campaign you will support the growth of Mineblock from the prototype phase into production. Your investment helps pay for essential programming hours to refine the code that supports the finely-tuned operating system and Minecraft server that provides the safe playing environment. Your pledge also helps build the first 100 Mineblocks which we will then deliver to you as our first wave of Beta testers. You will be personally responsible for providing valuable feedback that will in turn shape the evolution of Mineblock’s software and upgrades.

What We Need & What You Get

During this campaign we aim to reach our first 100 orders of Mineblock at a wholesale price. The proceeds of the campaign go right into building the Mineblock devices at the highest possible quality we can achieve. We don’t want to build a disposable computer, we want to create a solid secure Minecraft  archival device that will grow and age with your child.

Your support is important to us. Your contributions are rewarded in a variety of ways ranging from stickers to software downloads or SD cards to standard and deluxe models of Mineblock.

The reason we decided on an Indiegogo campaign was to get Mineblock into your hands. If we do not reach our campaign goal we will still deliver Mineblock to you, our campaign supporters.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help:
Please get the word out about Mineblock

Send out a tweet, share it on Facebook or Instagram.

A little sharing goes a long way and we won’t forget it.

Special Thanks

I'd like to thank my good friend, Afshin Mehin of Woke Design and Jason Miller, a former student from Emily Carr University of Art + Design, where I teach. Along with the folks at MakerLabs, they were incredibly helpful in supporting my endeavours through the prototyping of Mineblock.

Additionally, a big shout out goes out to my old time friend Anthony Baird for his video editing mastery and Carlos Flores for helping shoot the video.

Thanks for your help
